Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This product just didn't work for me at all.I tried experimenting with different amounts and application techniques and it always ended up the same. This product, on me, at least, just makes my curls look wet. Even when they're not. The wet look doesn't come from a cast, so I can't crunch it out. It just looks...well, slimy. Not great.So, I mean, curl definition was pretty good. It was a bit heavy for my hair, so it dragged my curls down quite a bit. What I ended up with consistently was defined, elongated curls that looked damp or a little greasy. I just wasn't a fan.Now, I have a tricky history with products containing lots of aloe. Usually, aloe dries my hair out a LOT. But I didn't have that problem with this product. Instead, I had the opposite extreme.It made me giggle a bit, because I realized that the look I got with this product is exactly what all the girls went for when I was a teenager in the '90s. If I'd had this product then, I would have been all set! Ha! Now, though, the wet curl look really isn't great for me.I think this product smells amazing. It is a bit sticky feeling, because it feels a bit like it never completely dries.Basically, I think what it boils down to is that this product just wasn't the right fit for my hair.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This works great on my natural hair. It defines the curls and holds them in place. The more I use the more defined the curls become. It also doesn’t dry my curls out. It smells amazing. Recommended

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I reviewed a few hair styling products for Vine recently that probably got a somewhat unfair advantage, because the weather was dry and they were paired with an additional product that I think really enhanced the hold. Well, it started raining and I ran out of that other product. But, this gel is supposed to be "ultra hold," so it should be fine, right?The hold was OK for a few hours, but it eventually gave it up to the humidity. I thought maybe that was just the way it was going to go (I'm still experimenting with wearing my hair curly), but then I tried one of my favorite gels and my curls lasted all day.I also prefer a pump bottle to a tub. It makes it easier to get the correct amount.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: My daughter has super curly hair that just comes in tight little ringlets all over her head. It is a challenge to keep her hair moisturized enough that it doesn't frizz up after the first day of wash. We try to only wash her hair once or twice a week because it dries out so bad. It is also a little on the fine side, not as fine as mine but definitely not thick and heavy. I am on the fence about this product.While it smells fantastic, it seems like it's made for someone who washes their hair every other day. I've tried it in large amounts and small amounts and both times the product sits heavy on her hair. I think this is definitely for someone with really thick strands. Again she has a lot of hair but it is a little finer. After it dries it's a little hard to get my fingers through the next day and I feel like it makes it a bit more tangly than normal. It's so heavy that it makes it almost impossible to refresh with water or another product. It's just product overload. While I think this is a fine product, it is definitely not for someone with lots of coily fine hair.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: great hold, not much definition
Review: I was expecting something more along the lines of the Kinky Curly custard, but this isn't quite that. It has excellent hold on it's own, my hair stays in it's curls very well for at least 2 full days before I notice any significant flattening or loss of pattern.However, it doesn't do much for definition for me. I have soft, 2c/3a hair and need to have a defining cream or lotion under this to get the maximum potential out of my curls. That's not necessarily a bad thing as I rarely use only one product, but for a defining and holding gel it's a bit lacking in the former's regard.It does maintain decent levels of softness though so I'm very pleased with that. My ends don't feel crunchy or hard with this.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Smell is divine, but I wish the glitter was more noticeable
Review: This does a great job on my wavy hair making it hold shape all day without a wet or crunchy look. I do wish that the glitter was a bit more noticeable. I know it isn't designed to look like big glitter, but there doesn't even seem to be a slight shimmer in the hair. Not a huge deal, but if it's not doing anything, just leave it out.The hold is great for all day wear and with a bit of scrunching and drying, my hair looks great. The scent is very tropical, but not overpowering. This is good because the scent does not dissipate during the day of being exposed to air and elements.Overall, this is a good product that goes a long way. The glitter isn't the most visible, but the hold is great and the scent is a fun tropical.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I’m impressed with this gel. SO Impressed! I washed my hair one morning and decided to use only this gel instead of doing my product-layering routine. I had a haircut later that day, so if things went south I had no commitment knowing my hair was going to be washed again soon. My hair literally looked amazing with this gel. The curls were perfectly defined, the frizz was controlled, and the entire application felt so hydrating (I had no idea that an aloe-focused gel could work so well). The gel itself is actually really pretty with its lovely shimmer, and the scent is pretty nice too. My hairdresser even said how nice my hair looked when I walked through her door. I don’t know how this stuff works, but it does. Great hair gel for my curls.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have to admit that when I first opened this product, it looked like the gel had sparkles in it and I got a bit annoyed LOL, but upon closer inspection and after scooping a bit out, its a completely clear hair gel that smells amazing and leaves no residue! I have used this on my and my daughters' hair and love it! It completely holds our curl patterns, but leaves hair flexible and soft enough without feeling crunchy. I also noticed that running my fingers through the hair after its been on for awhile and dried, that there were no white residue build-up, like some other gels tend to make.Very much loving this curly girl's dream of a gel and will be repurchasing!

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Smells good but doesn't bring out the curls that I'd hoped it would
Review: I have long, naturally curly hair that is medium thickness and I've been experimenting over the last week with this and how to get the most out of it. I've tried varying amounts with either air drying or blow drying with a defuser and I've never really gotten great results from it. No matter how much I use or what method of drying I use I would not consider it "ultra-hold", it's a light hold with my hair. Some products can really bring out the curls in my hair, this one does not. It actually produces more of a smooth wave look. On the positive side it smells good and leaves my hair looking natural and soft if I don't use too much of it.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Less Hold Than A Pomade, But Produces A More Natural Look That I Prefer
Review: I usually use pomades and pastes in my short, thick hair, but wanted to see what this gel would do.  I love it, and hold is dependent on how much you use.  No matter how much I apply, results always look natural while taming frizz.  Hold isn’t as intense as a pomade, but it does accentuate layers, curls and waves very well.  My hair is dry to begin with—I appreciate that the gel doesn’t make it stiff or more dry.  This is a great hair styling product for days when a more natural, tousled look is desired.  On days when humidity is high, I switch out to something with stronger hold, but this is what I now prefer to use most days.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Great version of "ultra hold"
Review: IMO this gel is lightweight and has a natural hold. It controls frizz and smoothes without getting crunchy and hard. I think the light hold is a much better look. You can really use a ton w/o it getting heavy too. My favorite method of applying is on damp hair after the shower. I work it through my hair from roots to ends and comb through with a wide tooth comb or denman brush. Great hold, no frizz and a fruity fresh scent. I think this is the first of this brand that I've tried, but I'll definitely have to check out their other products!:)

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This gel smells wonderful, and there is no crunch. I layer it with other gels because my hair needs the "crunch". The hardened cast that you get that makes the crunch does what curlers would do.  They create a pattern that keeps as your hair dries. With that said, this gives me a lot of moisture and smells lovely, like a tropical drink with coconuts. It's a bit pricier than my usual products, but since I layer it, it lasts a fairly long time.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Holy Grail Product!
Review: I’ve been embracing my natural hair texture and it has had a steep learning curve, but I’ve finally hit my stride in styling my wavy/curly hair. This product was the game changer. Other gels made my hair crispy to the point where I could not “scrunch out the crunch”. This adds moisture and definition without the crunchy feel and it smells amazing! I’m so glad I found this!

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: It Keeps curls in place while adding moisture, shine and definition. Soft, Crunch-Free Feel. This rich blend holds strong without the crunchy texture of other hair gels. Made With 100 Percent Aloe Vera as the First Ingredient, This vegan formula quenches tight curls to make them look and feel hydrated and healthy. And the infusion of coconut oil, papaya extract and plumeria extract gives them a natural, flake-free hold.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: My daughter has tried just about every product for curls, looking for those that don't dry out her hair. This is one of the winners. She really likes that it controls her hair and fights frizz (even in high humidity) without adding dry crunchiness. It doesn't take a lot to do her thick curls either so this tub will last a while. That means it works and it's economical. That's a 5 star product.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: a bit thick but smells fantastic
Review: I love the smell of the gel.  It is divine.  I do think it is a bit thick for my curls.  I think I will have more success with it if I mix a little water with it in my palm.  Without the water, I feel like I am pulling down too hard on my curls to apply it evenly. The little bit of water makes it glide through easier.  I think this will be best for thicker hair.  I like it and I love the scent.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This is a very dense, heavy gel. Doesn't dry out my hair. Can be heavy on fine or thin hair but will clump really nicely if that's what you're looking for. Doesn't offer too much of a hard cast and doesn't have my hair feeling too gunky once you break up the stiffness. A little goes a long way. Helps to tame the frizzy areas really nicely as well.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: A must have!
Review: I have been a long time fan of the Maui Moisture products and loved everything I have used so far and this product is no different. This is a very light holding gel used to define and moisturize your curls. This product works well with twist outs and braid outs, or a simple wash and go! The smell is awesome as usual and leaves no flaking.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Moisture rich curls
Review: Smells amazing and left my hair curly without the crunch. Easy to massage through hair. Living in the desert my hair gets dried out fast. This stuff gave moisture back to my curls. Love it!!

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: So great for my daughter's hair. She's mixed and has thick, coiled curls with some areas of different texture that doesn't curl as much. This works really well for defining her curls and making them look healthy. Even seems to provide moisture. Smells great. Surprised at the low price, considering how nice it works!

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This Curl Quench from Maui Moisture is awesome! This is the perfect styling gel for curly hair without the usual stiff crunch that most gels give. This works best with a silk cap, and apply after showering and when you get up the next morning, wow! Perfect soft curls! Love this product!

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: My thick curly hair loves product but sometimes gel can weigh it down and leave a crunch. This smells really nice and was easy to apply. My curls were soft and defined without being weighed down or crunchy. I love the size of this container!

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: Este gel hidrata bien el pelo y lo deja muy bonito ya que despues del lavado este le da el toque final alPelo

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: curl definer
Review: This product smells so good. It really define your curls. At least it feeling a bit moisturize. It is worth the cost.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Good hold
Review: I got this hoping to make my wavy hair have more curl to it. This does not make curls. It does hold hair though.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Great buy!
Review: Great stuff! Growing up with curly hair, I'm a product whore. I've used so many products over the years that at times I've gotten really discouraged but this gel is awesome. I use it with the mousse and it really works in my curls!

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Great for waves and curls!
Review: I recently began leaning into my natural wavy/curly texture more (2c-3a) and needed a gel to help my hair hold its shape. This stuff is great! It has flexible hold without being crunchy and smoothes out my curls very well. It smells like coconut, which isn't my favorite, but if you like that scent then this will probably be good for you. A little goes a long way!

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Horrible
Review: When I use this I end up with a tangled mess when dry or wet and my hair doesn’t really tangle.  You cannot comb through it when still wet. I can’t describe the way it feels but I had to wash it out right away every time

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Smells good
Review: Thia stuff smells amazing, it. Is Really thick and a but sticky, the hold is OK but it's just not hydrating enough for my particular hair needs

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Not as good as I was hoping
Review: I have super curly hair.  And this product did nothing.  I was disappointed.  Returned it.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Lovely absolutely lovely
Review: Smells good and keeps my hair in placeI will be ordering again

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Great hold
Review: This product smells wonderful and has a great hold. No crunch and my waves look beautiful and hardly any frizz. I really enjoy using this product.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: I love everything about this gel it was very smooth and light weight. I will be ordering again.
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   The scent was wonderful and I love the application very light weight.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Gel
Review: I do like the scent. Not crazy about gel but that’s just my preference.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Excellent hold compared to most gels.
Review: I really like the fact that I do not have to use as much of this product as I do with other gels a little bit does go a long way and of course a little bit more and does give a little bit more hold but you really don't need it. It really curls everything up nicely.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: It has a chemical smell to it
Review: It does hold the hair in place but it has a strong smell

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: excelente
Review: excelente producto

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: LOVE THIS HAIR CARE LINE!
Review: Great quality. Works amazing on 4c hair. Helps to define my curls without making my hair feel “crunchy.”

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Their price is  really good for the product
Review: I like using natural good ingredients for my hair . This product supplies exactly that. My hair is soft & manageable since using product.  Thank you.  All Maui’s products has a pleasant scent. Well, I should say the ones I’ve used so far.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: The best gel!
Review: Love this gel! Makes my hair curly but soft curls and not hard. The smell is light. I think it is worth it and will buy again.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Impressive
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   This product was surprisingly better than the mouse I was using before to hold my curls. Found out about it from curly girls on youtube! Upon reviewing their suggestions, this product was within my price range for hair products. Holds well. Smells amazing. Doesn’t make me crunchy. Sold 😁

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Disappointed
Review: This product clearly stated does not flake. That’s a lie my hair was just washed used for 2 days and it’s fall flaked up smh.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Better than expected
Review: Purchased this by accident instead of smoother and actually worked better on my curls to control them

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: love this
Review: Gives me a wonderful wash and go

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: I love it! Will be buying more & I love that it's vegan
Review: It works great on my straight hair and it works great on my son's curls as well. Smells great. Feels great works great! Found my new hair care brand. As with other products though if you use a leave in conditioner and there's a good amount in your hair and you use this it may clump up the conditioner and you'll have to rewash your hair so be aware. But that's with all gels from my experience.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Shiny, Uniform Curly 3b, 3c hair approved !
Review: Best hair gel I have ever used! Just purchased another so I don’t run out. The reason why this product is quite superior to other brands, natural source products and no alcohol, whilst giving me pretty curls all day.

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Smells great
Review: Little bit goes a long ways. Keeps hair from getting frizzy and I love the smell

Product: Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Ultra-Hold Gel, for Curly Hair Styling, Vegan, No Drying Alcohols, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 12oz
Title: Thumbs down 👎🏽
Review: This has no hold at all for ponytails and it’s so flaky. My daughter’s hair looks like she has a bad dandruff issue.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Great for Fine, Wavy Hair
Review: I was very happy with this product for my fine, thin, wavy hair.  Unlike other reviewers, I did not find that this product dried my hair out at all.  It is great for second day curls, especially during the summer time.  I wasn't wild about the scent at first, but now I am used to it and it doesn't seem to last after use.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Adds moisture and shine...
Review: This was just what my hair needed. I wanted some shine and after a couple of sprays that's what I had. There's no need to spray too much because a little goes a long way. I have long fine textured hair. I use a spay or two  on my hair when damp and then a couple additional sprays when dry. The scent is nice and not overpowering. This doesn't have a heavy, oily feel to it. I would say it's quite lightweight. It washes out easily and works with other styling products very well. I would definitely recommend this.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Strong smell and sticky hair.
Review: I really wanted this product to work, but it made my curly 3a/b hair sticky and tacky to the touch even after drying; I tried using less and more to see what a good amount would be, but I was dissatisfied with any amount I used. It didn’t make my hair softer and shiny as I had hoped. The scent is also VERY strong.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Overwhelming Smell
Review: This stuff worked great on my fine, curly hair. Unfortunately, it has a very strong smell that lingers. I had a slamming headache all day from it. At first I thought it wasn't too bad, reminded me of my old Hawaiian Tropics tanning oil I used in the 80's LOl! But after a while it really started to bother me and gave me a headache. Too bad, I have been looking for an affordable replacement for DevaCurl Mister Right since I can't find that anymore (I think it's discontinued). Due to the strong, chemical, artificial fragrance I can't stand to use this again. The search continues....

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Not perfect, but I do like it
Review: I have curly hair and do morning refreshes often. While this alone does not do for my rereshes - this doesn't seem to perk my curls up the greatest but this is very important to my routine.  I use the twist brand to refresh... but that doesn't control frizz very well.  So I go to this as the last step and it not only smells good but tames my frizz.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: A lovely-smelling mess!
Review: I'm sure I'll like the conditioner when I try it, but when I opened the slightly moist box it came in, the box's interior was shiny with dried conditioner. The lid had only been screwed on partway and it leaked during its journey to my house. I was pretty bummed to get such a messy package with a partially empty bottle.Best-smelling box I've ever received in the mail, though!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Flash frizz
Review: Was excited to try this out drugstore find. Made my hair gross by drying it out extensively. Pass!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: My fave shampoo
Review: I love this line. My hair is usually wavy but I blow dry straight. It’s also very fine so using shampoo and conditioner that weigh it down and are “moisturizing” usually just make it flat and greasy on top. This is perfect. Also the flax seed in it helps as a natural dht blocker which contributes to thinning hair. I noticed since I started using my hair is slowly getting better and I’m losing WAY less hair and it’s started growing in thicker. Can’t be 100 % it’s shampoo alone but it doesn’t hurt and I LOVE how my hair feels with this.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Thick water
Review: What on earth is this product supposed to do?? It has an ok smell, I like the bottle... that's where it ends. Seems like thick milky white water. There are better products

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: AWFUL perfume scent. Overwhelmingly strong.
Review: I was so excited to find this, because I love the Maui products, with limited ingredients, BUT it’s unlikely I’ll be able to use this product. The perfume scent is SOOO strong. It’s like walking through the fragrance section at a department store. A lot of the product had spilled inside the package so I had to clean it up and by the time I was finished, I already had a headache. It’s like Grandma’s perfume. Will likely throw away. Very disappointed.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Use sparingly
Review: This is my go-to spray in the morning when styling my daughter's mixed/wavy hair for school! I spray her hair down with water first then add some sprays of this product and lightly scrunch. Use a few sprays to start then add more product in areas you need it because I have noticed it will weigh the hair down and create a sticky texture if over-applied.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Contains isopropanol-- dries out hair!
Review: Not impressed by this conditioner. Since I started using it my hair has been dry and unmanageable. Looked more closely at the ingredients and it contains isopropyl alcohol-- I wouldn't have bought it if I'd seen that.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Just read what is NOT in this product!
Review: I have THREE of the various selections of Maui shampoo conditioner and spray plus hair mask. My hairdresser turned me on to it. Great products for a wonderful price.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Does restore Coils
Review: Every summer I have my Stylist to roll my non permed hair on flexible rods after a week the coils get flat, and I would have to roll the sides. After buying Maui' s refreshing mist I just spray let set a few minutes and run my fingers threw it. And it good as it was a week ago.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Works so well
Review: I’m in love with this spray. It’s very light weight on your hair but sets my curls so well. I still use gel on my hair. I have fine curly waves. I don’t know what number of waves my hair is considered but it’s not super curly and not wavy, something in between.  After I wash my hair I use this spray then use my gel. I get so many compliments on my hair. Love this spray

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have super fine, thin, frizzy curly hair and was hoping this won’t weight it down… it does. Just a few sprays and my hair looks super greasy and oily once it dries. It also makes my frizzy ends look more dry yet oily (if that makes sense). The photos show my hair wet after I applied only 3 sprays. This could be great for someone with much thicker hair but definitely didn’t work for my thin curly hair.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: A little too oily for baby fine hair
Review: This product smells great and helps to hold curls and define them...but it's too oily for my baby fine hair and makes it look oily.Would probably work great and look better on thicker hair.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Hi, it’s Glamorous Gem, hope you all are having a wonderful day,Anyway, like many curl users, even I don’t wish to do all those extra steps every morning just to keep a fresh look. I wash my hair every 5-7days max and I can’t have too much moisture for my thick, curly hair type. But, mists like these keep them looking good while preventing that dry and brittle part we hate about our curls.I am a avid user of natural hair products because they can do so much good for your roots. Give your hair a break sometimes and take out all the chemicals. This has no chemicals what so ever, no parabens, no gluten, no mineral oil, no sulfates, no silicones, synthetic dyes, etc.It has a clean overall look as well. Despite the bottle being green, the mist is actually white. It has some fragrance in this, but it’s the last on the ingredient list and the other smells such as aloe, coconut, citrus shines much more than anything else in it. So, I don’t even smell it. But, otherwise it smells amazing and definitely adds a nice, clean scent to your curls.I love how lightweight this is, not sticky at all and the sprayer adds such a great coverage even over little sections. Scrunching up my hair is easy and the product moves easily over your hair.Sinks in very quickly and absorbs/dries nicely, adds a decent definition to my dry hair. Even though, product is at its best for wet/damp hair, I still prefer dry for minimal steps. But no matter what state your curls are in, it definitely minimizes the brittle/dryness that comes with them.The isn’t anything to complain about in this mist. It curled my hair up just great and softened them equally as well.  I just add a bit of holding gel and they are back to the way I like them.So, all in all, it seems like a very wonderful product from the Maui moisture brand that I am slowly starting to love. 5/5 earned from me.PS: No matter the nature, I only write honest, unbiased, and authentic reviews. Thanks for reading:)

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I wanted so bad to love this, but for me it feels like build up on your hair super fast. I can't imagine using it multiple times a day. My hair felt pretty gross even after just the first time of light misting to refresh. After the second time, I wanted to wash my hair again. It just felt so gunky and it makes my hair tangle even faster. It doesn't make my hair dry, but doesn't actually soften it up either. It won't feel like using a leave in or anything like that. It just feels like .. build up. Gross. Doesn't soften or moisturize.My final complaint is the spray pattern of the nozzle. It sprays too broadly. It sprays everywhere. If I'm spraying the right side, I feel the mist wrap around me and gets all over both shoulders and both arms. If you try to hold it closer to your hair to avoid the over spray, then you will just end up with it all concentrated in one spot, but still some gets everywhere else as well. The spray needs a redesign for sure. I wouldn't get it again. It just makes my hair feel really gunky and dirty. It needs washed much faster than usual. And then the spray issue just ticks me off.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: 3-4 sprays  of Maui Moisture's Curl Refresher Mist on my  damp, shoulder length, thick hair is all it takes to wake up my natural curls and waves! Maui's curl mist adds volume and softness to my hair. It keeps flyaways calm and hair nice and smooth. My niece's hair has coils and when she stopped by a few days ago, I had her try it and she was so excited by the bounce and volume it added to her hair.  She's in college and said she was going to have her mother send her a bottle in a care package. Said  she's looking forward to not having to wash her hair daily, she can just revive and freshen her coils with Maui Moisture mist.I love that 100% aloe vera is the very first ingredient, followed by flaxseed oil , coconut water and citrus oil.  All good and important ingredients to help keep hair hydrated and healthy. I just as much love the fact the spray is free of parabens, silicones, surfactants , dyes , mineral oil and gluten.  Its so easy to use: give the bottle a good shake, spray hair , scrunch hair. DONE! That's it! That's all it takes make curls look gorgeous.  I love the way it dispenses when sprayed; it comes out in a mist form , ensuring hair will be evenly covered with the product. Its not heavy; it doesn't weigh hair down or make it look/feel oily or greasy nor does it become hard /crunchy.  There is a light scent to this mist.  Its a citrusy scent. I'm not normally a fan of citrus scents but this scent is GREAT!  Light and airy and isn't overpowering or gagging at all.Maui's refresher mist works great and smells SO good. Because it works so well and I only need a few sprays of the nozzle to sufficiently cover my hair, I do find the price reasonable.  If you're looking for some help to maintain  your curls, give this a try.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have natural curly hair with medium curls, that's very long. Keeping my curls looking and feeling healthy without the fuss and frizz can be overwhelming sometimes.Finding affordable hair products that work well without has chemicals isn't always the easiest.Thankfully, I found this wonderful and affordable, Maui Moisture's Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist for lightweight to medium curls.The bright green packaging and milky green spray colors, I think are both beautiful and tropical.The misting spray has the most amazing scent of aloe vera coconut water & other lush ingredients. It has a wide yet lightweight mist with a milky green look and feel.It has great conditioning and moisturizing power from the first application. It helped to calm my frizz and define my curls with little to no effort on my end. Simply, mist evenly onto my damp hair and scrunch!Did not make my hair greasy nor left with a residue. Just simple goodness and beautiful tamed curls.I really like knowing that the products I use in my hair are Vegan, Paraben Free and Silicone Free, just as this Maui's Moisture spray is.At a price point of approximately $13.99 for this 8.0 fl.oz. bottle, I think is an amazing price for such a great working natural hair product.YES! I highly recommend this curl refresher spray to anyone with lightweight to medium curls, like myself, that need their curls looking and feeling flawlessly bouncy and beautiful!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I'll be honest: I didn't love this product as a curl refresher. It was just OK for me. The issue is, to see the kind of redefinition I was hoping for, I had to use what was, apparently, too much of this product, which just resulted in my hair looking greasy. I have other refresher products that can reactivate my curls without turning them greasy, so I was *thisclose* to writing off this product as just not right for me after my third attempt.But! Then I had an idea. I only wash my hair every 5 or 6 days. At night, I sleep with it up in a satin-lined cap. Thanks to covid, I haven't had it cut or colored in almost a year, so it's pretty damaged and tends to be dry, starting at about mid-length. Prior to putting it in a cap at night, I usually smooth some hair oil over it so it can sit with the extra moisture on it overnight. I decided to try that with this product instead. I spritzed my hair pretty lightly, and rubbed it in gently, just as I normally do with hair oil. Then I put it up and went to bed. In the morning, I was pleased to see that the overall moisturizing effect was the same. And when I refreshed my curls using my normal curl refresher, they retained just enough of that extra moisture to look healthy and well-moisturized, but not sticky or greasy.So, as an overnight substitute for hair oil, this product worked great for me. That's great news, because this product is a LOT less expensive than the hair oil I normally use!So, overall, I'm happy with this product, even though it didn't work for me for its intended purpose. As an overnight moisturizer and sub for hair oil, it's great.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Not for Aloe sensitive hair
Review: I didn’t realize aloe was the first ingredient, and this left my baby fine, low porosity curls a frizzy mess

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I regularly use homemade hair spritzers, one containing flaxseed water and another spray bottle with rosemary water for hair growth and conditioning. I was curious to try this because of the flaxseed and Aloe vera ingredients to see if it would work just as well. It works surprisingly well (not quite as good as my homemade hair water) but still conditions quite well. I have long but fine hair. The only thing is it's heavily perfumed. The scent smells nice (like summer/florals), but is slightly overpowering for me personally. I still plan on using this as a quick hair fix for my dry ends. It's a nice product at a reasonable price.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I have very thin, fine 2c wavey hair.  I was hoping this would be a nice wave refresher.  However, after trying it 5 different times with 5 different application ways it still didn’t work for me.  At first my hair waves would be tight, hydrated and look refreshed… but after about an hour they would be right back to their second day flatness but with a sticky/tacky feeling.  Perhaps my hair is just to baby fine for this product? My hair typically responds great to this brand but this particular product was a miss for me.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: Both my daughter and I have thick, curly, caucasian hair that we wash, condition, and air dry to style. She has two wash days a week followed by a plop with a leave-in conditioner,  and I wash my hair each day, followed by a heavy conditioner and leave-in. We've both been using this refresher mist and we both enjoy the scent, but it seems to work better on her 20-something hair versus mine which is 50-something and over 50% gray.This flaxseed mist is definitely lightweight and doesn't dry out your hair, but those with thin to normal (thickness) moisturized curls that are already trained will gain the most benefit from using it.  We both found it was non-irritating to our skin and scalps, and the scent was soft and pretty going on our hair which disappeared quickly when it was dry.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: My curl pattern is changing with age and hormones but I would say I am about a 2b/2c depending on the day. I wash and can go a couple of days before the curl starts to frizz or just go straight. Most hair products weigh my curls down or make them limp and lazy. I gave this a try and was pleasantly surprised. First, the smell is fantastic. Fresh, clean light scent. The spritz is very light and I just sprayed this after working in my other shaping cream and gel. I then "plopped" my hair for about 10 minutes to get the curls scrunched as I normally do. I am letting my hair air dry and so far the curls look really nice. The big test of this will be a day or two from now when I use it as a "refreshing" spray.....but for the first use I am pretty pleased.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: not a bad if you use lightly curl reviver
Review: I have short 3a/3b curls and I sleep in a bonnet, but my curls still have a tendency to get wonky and need some work on day two and definitely on day three.  I haven't had a lot of luck with products that are specifically made to revive curls.  Most of the ones that I tried were sticking and left my hair feeling tacky.  I would rather have frizzy crazy hair than sticky tacky hair.  I used my fine mist water bottle and gave my whole head of hair a light misting to add some moisture.  Then I used this spray very sparingly all over, as well.  I scrunch the curls and finger coiled a few rougher areas.  My curls did not bounce back right away, but after a few minutes (while the curls dried) they started to spring back.  My curls didn't feel overly sticky or tacky if I barely used any.  When I tried using it on my day three hair I think I used too much and it didn't do as well.  I think less is more with this one.  After a few uses I almost feel like I get a better result with just water because I don't have to worry about using too much and being sticky all day. Not sure I will continue using.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This curl refresher mist has a great smell. The spray has some citrus notes detected. Normally I use a leave on conditioner and a curling gel to achieve the look that I want. I tried using this refresher mist as a replacement and I got very similar results from about 4-5 pumps of the spray and then I scrunched my hair up with my hands. My hair was not frizzy and my curls were defined. The only complaint that I have about this spray is that it leaves a slippery residue on the floor. I had originally sprayed a pump on my hair while I was standing in a tiled room and than I noticed that it left a slippery spot on the floor. After that, I just made sure that I was on the bathroom mat when spraying the refresher.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Miracle product
Review: I have moderate very thick curly hair. I have been using tons of different shampoos for the past 10 years and I am 27. Today I used my newly purchased Maui flaxseed shampoo and conditioner, and I believe I have found the shampoo and conditioner I will use for the rest of my life. I’m so used to getting out of the shower and putting 2 to 3 different kinds of products from the same company, not Maui. My hair has not felt so light, so soft and so volumized in almost 10 years. I have tried numerous products with the no victory. This product is amazing it’s a little more expensive than things that people usually use but it’s definitely worth it and you don’t use that much of it. The smell is amazing I can’t stop smelling the shampoo or my hair. It feels so soft thank you So much to whoever made this product.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: Good lightweight wave definition, but not enough hold. I have waist long thick wavy hair for reference. I can have wavy styled hair that last for a couple days with and without the help of products. My hair looked great after using this Maui Moisture Hairstyling product, but fell to straight hair after several hours. I was super bummed because I really love the tropical scent and lightweight feel of this products. My hair felt silky soft, without any tangles or crunchiness. Maybe my hair is just too heavy for this product. I don’t recommend this product for anyone with very long hair, unless you have a tight curl pattern.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I like products by Maui. I find they really work well for my hair and this hair mist is no different. It comes in this bottle with a nice mister on the top that allows me to evenly apply the product to my hair. The hair mist smells fantastic and that fragrance stays with my hair for hours on end which is an extra benefit.The mist gives my hair extra life and does what it says. My hair looks great and really looks great. All in all very happy with this product.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have curly hair that I am trying to coax into its full curly possibilities. Second and third day hair doesn't look very curly or nice so I'm trying products to help it bounce back. This did an ok job on my mids and near the root, but my ends just got drier than they already were. It smells nice and tropical, when you first spray it or on your hands it is a little sticky until it dries, but then its softer.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This is a great little curl refresher that works well on my daughter's head. She has curly little ringlets all over her head and her hair is plentiful but on the finer side. This does help me finger calm through them and helps eliminate some of the frizz. It can be overused and get a little sticky but used sparingly this does a great job. It smells fantastic and that makes me happy because there's some funky smelling stuff out there. To cut the product, I usually use this and a little fine misted water for just a daily refresher. Otherwise, we would have some major frizz going on here!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: My daughters both have loose and tight curls. In the mornings I need to refresh the curls. This product is easy to spray without soaking their hair. The spray does not leave their hair feeling stiff or sticky. I love the smell of the spray, very fruity scent.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: First off, this line smells amazing! It's one of those mist I spray on my hair and then smell my hair. The scent is a light coconut smell and it lingers for a while too. My hair is naturally curly so I can spray this on after my hair has been towel dried and I would use it to gives it a nice healthy shine. Or I would spray it on completely dry hair a few days later to give it extra bounce and texture. I do squeeze my hair after I spray it to keep things in place. It's moisturizing and does not make my hair feel crunchy. I’m glad I got to test it out!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: 1.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I tried using this product a few times with no success. I find that it is very sticky and weighs my hair down. It’s possible it could be because I have fine, thin hair though. The consistency of the product isn’t thick, so it must be something in the  ingredients that’s causing it to make my hair feel sticky and weighed down. Only 1 star for me.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This product performed for me exactly how it's described to. The product comes out in a fine mist that is lightweight and doesn't weigh our curls down. It smells tropical fresh quickly absorbs into the hair, leaving great curl definition after its dried. Very much love this product for my and my girls' hair! We all have long thick naturally curly hair with multiple curl textures and patterns within our heads, and this product worked really well for all of us. Would repurchase and I definitely recommend it!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This spray really tames my daughter's curls. It makes her hair less poofy and frizzy. It does weigh her hair down a bit, which she doesn't like so much because she has thin curly hair. On days with lots of humidity, though, she appreciates this. It doesn't feel filmy, sticky, crunchy, or greasy in her hair like a lot of other curl sprays do. She sprays it on her hair while it's damp and scrunches it. It has a nice, light scent that's not really noticeable once it dries.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This mist does a great job at calming the frizz on my daughter’s curly hair.After using this product her hair is no longer super frizzy and the curls look so much nicer.The bottle mists really nice and evenly.The mist is fine and I’m surprised how long the bottle lasts - it feels like I’m using a ton of product but I’m actually not!My daughter’s hair isn’t crispy after using - which she appreciates.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I got this to use on my toddler boys who both have very curly hair. I like to spray it on in the morning as a curl refresher and it is amazing how beautifully their curls bounce back after I spritz this on.  It is very lightweight and almost watery. I love how it smells like coconuts but natural not an overwhelming synthetic scent that some can have. It also does not leave any residue. Just beautiful bouncy curls!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Would rather wash with bubble gum
Review: I had such high hopes for this conditioner with so many good reviews from others with my hair type… but this is by far the worst conditioner I’ve ever used. The scent reminds me of middle school bath and body works. It left a thick, sticky film on my hair and it would not dry. I got a shower  and my hair was still soaked three hours later. Waking up the next morning- still soaked. It never dried fully before I showered again. I tried it again and found it was twice as bad trying to blow dry my hair. My hair is knotted and sticky like cotton candy. Terrible product. Absolute trash.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I absolutely love the ingredients this spray has because it’s so good for my curls. This spray works as a great reviver/refresher of my curls without weighing them down. It provides good moisture and smells so good. Recommended

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This worked much better on my wet hair than on my 2nd day dry hair. When I tried to use it to refresh my hair, it left behind a sticky mess.  When I used it on freshly wet hair, it worked much better.  It has a fresh clean scent that was pleasant and not overwhelming.  I really appreciate the lack of silicone in it.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Love
Review: Just got this at my local grocery store in Texas. Really enjoy it, I have thick wavy hair and its on the frizzy side. The shampoo and conditioner combo have been working great so far, my hair seems wavier and less frizzy, but not weighed down or greasy at all. The scent smells great too!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Ehhh
Review: Ehh depends on your rpeference I suppose. It makes my hair feel greasy. I like my hair to feel natural and soft and this didnt really do that. It does have a pleasant scent to it tho.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: amazing tbh
Review: ive used maui for so long and this is one of my absolute favorites! it smells super good and is very moisturizing, i ordered and it came in brand new, it came in a plastic bag that was delayed and inside the box, 5/5 ill definitely order again when i run out

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Long Term User & Love it!!
Review: I’ve been using this for over a year and I absolutely love it! My old go to was coconut, but I realized bc I had fine hair it was sometimes difficult to find the balance of using too much or too little. This product has been the perfect replacement and has helped my hair grow and stay healthy. Also it has helped with my Spring-Time curly frizz! I 10/10 recommend trying this product!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Great shampoo & conditioner
Review: Only issue is the conditioner is too thick to dispense from the bottle, but all besides that, i love this product!! My hair is super manageable!!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: It doesn't make curls
Review: I got this thinking it created curls. It doesn't MAKE curls. The scent is tropical and this does add manageability to the hair.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Worst Conditioner Ever
Review: This stuff is horrible. Couldn’t get a comb through my hair after using.  I had to re-shampoo and condition with a different brand.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: smells nice and leaves my hair super soft

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: I didn't like the tacky feeling ony hair. Will not be buying again.
Review: This product made my hair feel tacky. Will not buy again.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Love the fragrance!
Review: Smells awesome and  works great.  I like it because it leaves my hair soft and easier to manage; not as harsh with natural ingredients.  I color my hair a lot so this is a giant plus!  I recommend all types; my daughter and granddaughters use this so we have several choices in the shower 😊Only disappointment is several times we received it with a broken lid or the bottle had leaked inside the package…BUT the company replaced it ASAP!! Service was wonderful!!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Actually works!
Review: My wavy hair is a disaster the next day because of how I sleep. I spray my head a little with water first to moisten my hair, then spray some of this stuff and crunch and I'm out the door. Makes my curls come back alive. A++++

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: I got my curls back!
Review: I use this after their curly mousse and it totally brought my curls back to life.  I put it in once my hair is almost dry, but still has a little dampness to it and scrunch scrunch scrunch.  I have seriously never used something that works this well for my curls.  😁

Title: Awful
Review: I’ve been using Maui Moisture products for the past 6 years. Sometimes I change what kind I’m using based on my hairs needs. I chose to focus on my curls so I got this with the matching shampoo. They smell absolutely great! But the conditioner dries my hair out like CRAZY! No matter how much I use it makes my hair feel brittle and it makes it come out in clumps!! I have never been more disappointed with a conditioner. I’d be better off with $1 store conditioner.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Love it
Review: My curls and waves came out so soft and moisturized, and the product smells good. My hair had volume when dried, so it didn’t weigh it down. Will be repurchasing!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Love it
Review: My curls and waves came out so soft and moisturized, and the product smells good. Lathers very well. My hair had volume when dried, so it didn’t weigh it down. Will be repurchasing!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Smells great but sort of heavy
Review: My hair feels a little like it has a heavy gel in after I use it. The scent is pretty good I do enjoy that and the convenience of the spray bottle. The idea is great I just wish the product was a little more light weight.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Shampoo & Conditioner
Review: love this shampoo and conditioner! i recently tried another brand and couldn't wait until the bottles were empty so i could go back to this. it leaves my hair light and bouncy, instead of weighted down like many other products. the refresher spray is tricky though, i'd suggest spraying it onto your hands and then curling your curls and not using a lot. if you use too much it can become sticky. no down sides to the shampoo and conditioner though! love it!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Absolutely the best!
Review: I have 2C/3A hair. It’s curly wavy medium fine hair. Everything weighs my hair down. This is the VERY FIRST curl refresher I have ever used that does not weigh my hair down or make my hair look greasy. I used it all winter and every morning I spray a little on the frizzy curls and done. This is the first time in six years since going natural that I have loved my hair in the winter. Just finished my first bottle. I’m about to buy another.  I love the smell and it’s more of a nonoily mist. Never change the ingredients. I love it!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz

Review: Love this product, will be buying again! It does feel sticky in the hair until it dries. My only draw back is that it does seem to make my hair look darker for whatever reason.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz

Title: Buy This Product!
Review: I had the most unpredictable, frizzy, wimpy curls ever! Then I started using this flaxseed line of products and it changed my life!! I use the shampoo, conditioner, and second day curl spray and it works amazing! I am 30 years old, my hair didn’t start to get curly until my late teens so I had no idea how to manage them. For a long time I simply straightened my hair. Since changing to the Maui hairline I have embraced my curls and gotten SO many compliments!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: My husband new fav
Review: I have wavy/curly bleached hair it always needs more moisture and hold. When I wear my hair natural this is the best. It helps so much and It feels healthier. This is now our second bottle, since my husband loves it to. His hair extra curly when he uses it.
