Review: Very strong coconut aroma and mostly water.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Curls + Flaxseed Curl Refresher Mist, Conditioning and Moisturizing Spray with Aloe Vera, Flaxseed Oil, Coconut Water, Vegan, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, 8oz
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: I have long medium thick curly hair. As I’ve gotten older, I’ve been noticing the products I used to rely upon do not work the same way. I was often unhappy with my hair. At first I was hesitant because it doesn’t foam much, but it left my hair squeaky clean and feeling fresh. The real test was how my hair looked after it dried. It wasn’t as much curl as I was hoping for, but what there was consisted of nice loose and long ringlets. Reading previous review I know many complained over the smell. I love it. It smells clean and in a way reminds me of something in the mint family. The smell does stay with you, but I did it find it as strong as others said. I only needed a dollop about the size of a quarter and took my time working it in. I am very happy with it so far.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Not at all what I expected
Review: As I applied this to my wet, curly hair.....everything seemed fine.HOWEVER, once it started to air dry it was a strange mix of crunchy yet tacky.I couldn't run my fingers through my hair to try and separate curls or fluff the roots.I had to rinse it out before it was finished drying.I've tried a LOT of different products over the years......but this one was VERY strange.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Great for curly hair
Review: I have hair that forms into ringlets; they used to frizz but this stuff is AMAZING.  Really makes my hair shine and keeps the curls smooth.  If the curls start to sag during the day, I wet my finger tips and scrunch the curls and they bounce right back.  I do the same on the days I don't want to wash my hair.  Smells lovely, too--not heavy but really beachy.I originally bought it in a drug store but, apparently, it's a very stealable substance as their inventory says they have it but no one could find ANY on 3 different occasions! Thanks, Amazon!

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Good with my blonde wavy hair
Review: This lightweight foaming mousse is great. It’s got a mild coconut scent and is one of the few products that doesn’t weigh down my fine, blonde hair. I use with a diffuser and light hairspray and it lasts all day without feeling greasy, frizzy, etc.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Me deja el cabello como una muñeca Barbie vieja
Review: Lo intente dos veces pero deja mi cabello como una muñeca Barbie vieja, se fue directo a la basura.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Left my natural hair dry and dull
Review: Loved the smell and the texture of this product, I had super curl definition. However, after diffusing my hair it lost it's curl definition within a couple of hours and became extremely dull and dry. I don't know maybe I did something wrong but this product is not for me. .

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Hair
Review: Dont like the way it makes my hair feel

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Disappointing
Review: I had high hopes for this product as the reviews were overall pretty good. I've used curl mousse my whole life and wanted to try something different. The first time I used it, I was happy with the scent. It's definitely coconut scented, which I love. And it worked well with the scent of my shampoo, so that was a win. However, that was the only positive. Once my hair was styled and dried, it looked like a matted ball of fur. I had no definition to my curls/waves and my hair was STICKY. Literally, sticky. I tried to give it a couple of days to figure itself out, but it just got worse. My hair was such a tangled mess by the second day, I had to wash it out. I thought, "well, maybe I used it wrong" so I tried it again the following week and let my hair air dry instead of diffusing it. But nope, same issue.  I tucked the mousse into my basket of hair products and said I'd try again later because maybe third time's the charm? Fast forward a few weeks and I went to use it again, except no foam came out. The dispenser just squirted straight liquid instead of the foamy mousse. I spent 5 minutes trying to figure out why it wouldn't spray mousse and then gave up and used the liquid instead. Aaaaand nope. Still isn't working right. My hair just looked wet and greasy and it was sticky again. So tangled, not soft or lightweight. I'm so frustrated and disappointed because I've been using mousse for almost 20 years and haven't had an issue like this ever. I'll definitely trash this product and won't be buying it again.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Super Impressed
Review: I have struggled every since I was little to find the right kind of products for my hair. This product does wonders for my hair! It doesn’t take long to dry . It doesn’t weigh down my hair or anything like that. It smells great and it makes my hair look very pretty and nourished. I don’t use any other products with it. I just wash and condition my hair while I’m in the shower and wrap my hair up in a towel. Then I comb through my hair one more time and put a mountain of foam in my hand and I do this maybe 3 times for my scalp, my middle section of hair and then my bottom section of hair. I then comb my hair again and then finger comb my hair and just let it air dry. And it turns out amazing! I have used a hair dryer too but I like the results better when I air dry. I hope this helps.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: LOVE!!!!!
Review: Edit: I had added a picture of my hair, but whoever reviewed my review for this product posted a picture that I have never even taken. My picture was not on the original review. Hopefully the picture the reviewer posted instead of mine, will not show up on this review.My hair has been super dry ever since I chopped it all off and let my natural grey grow. This has added the moisture my hair has desperately needed! I've tried more expensive hair products that did not help the dryness and left my hair feeling heavy. I will be buying this product again in the future ☺️

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Perfect for my hair
Review: I have always worn mousse. I like my hair to hang naturally but back out of my face. Mousse does the trick for me. I try a new brand here and there... but usually go back to TREsemme. On a lark, I picked up a bottle of this. I was a bit startled when I discovered that this mousse did not use an aerosol dispenser. I thought, "this is going to be bad." I thought it would apply and hold like a gel, which is too much for me. I was wrong. This mousse is absolutely perfect for my hair. I doubt I will ever try another brand... as long as I can continue to find this brand.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Great for Waves
Review: This product works really well for my 2a wavy, high porosity hair. It leaves me with beautiful, soft waves and even some spirals. This product DOES develop a cast as it dries (that crunch people don't like). The purpose of this is to hold your hair in your curly pattern as you air dry or diffuse it. Once your hair is fully dry, gently scrunch it and the cast will break. You'll be left with soft, hydrated hair. The aloe in this works wonders for my high porosity. I've noticed my hair overall looking healthier since I started using it.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Simply amazing...
Review: After using this I can't even tell I have product in my hair once dry, no need to scrunch cast, it leaves my hair bouncy and touchable with no noticeable scent.  I have very fine thin light hair so that is a major struggle with a lot of products leaving my hair feeling sticky or looking greasy or weighing it down and I'm also very sensitive to scents and perfumes. This stuff is perfect, I can only tell I've used anything because my hair looks thicker with more volume and less frizz.  Using this makes wash and go hair possible for me giving me princess curls with zero effort.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Not what I was looking for
Review: The scent and lightweight ness of this was fine, however, it made my hair feel so very dry after I had used it and then washed, and trying to brush my hair out after having used this product and washed it out, was nearly impossible. It changed the texture of my hair and took several washes and discontinuing use for it to go back to normal. Also I feel like I would have to use a ton of it for it to really work ... just not what I was looking for.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: The perfect hold
Review: This stuff works! I have thick hair and experimented with the flexi rods trend! This stuff really held the curls!!

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Concentrated
Review: I dont know how to describe the texture, but this product is super concentrated. When you pump it out, the foam is thick and very sticky. I had to dilute it by half with water. I guess that's a good thing since now I have twice the product

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: It does the job!
Review: I like the hold this foam gives me and the scent! But it doesn’t do much in the wag of moisturize or defining my curls, and if I add one pump too much it looks a bit like my LA gel day in 6th grade, crunchy.. I do have pretty fine wavy hair though, so it probably works better in coarse hair.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Not for my curl pattern
Review: I have thick 2c- 3a hair texture and this didn’t really work for me. I need a more firm hold. My moms hair texture is 2a-2b (thick as well but lees course) and it works better for her. It just felt sticky and heavy in my hair and didn’t help my curls form or stay in their style despite the light formula. Love the sent tho. The texture is more like a foamy soap then a traditional moose. I couldn’t say anything about the “moisturizing” affects because the product wasn’t right for my hair.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Moisturizing and Light
Review: As I get older, my hair is becoming more wavy and dry. I've tried several different products. Maui moisture mousse is great! It's very moisturizing yet doesn't weigh down my fine hair. I've gotten the best and easiest waves from the product and "plopping" with a t-shirt alone! Plus, I love the way it smells! It's sort of summer-y but not strong. I have finally found my go-to hair product!

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: I’m surprised it’s so cheap honestly I feel like I’m getting away with something
Review: This is the best ever honestly I’m kind of shocked my hair is really delicate in a weird way it gets really frizzy easily kinda looks like you know like a big fuzzball but right now with this  Curly moose product that I bought it looks really good and it feels good too I’m really amazed everybody’s been complementing my hair because of this product

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: 3b/ 3c hair
Review: Bought this product for the first time. Love it for my daughter she like to wear hats. And this definitely held her curls beautifully. No crunchy curls.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Makes your hair very crunchy
Review: I was hoping with it being soft hold it wouldn’t be like most mousses but unfortunately it dries crunchy and stiff. There are much better products out there for curly hair.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Good in a pinch
Review: I have really curly hair.  I love the mouse in this brand and decided to try this product.  I was not completely satisfied because once my hair dried it was very frizzy and product provided no definition or hold to any of my curls.  Probably better for individuals who do not have thick curls.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Amazing results
Review: Sooooo good!!! Amazing definition, quick working, and moisturizing... One of my favorite Maui products. I use all of the Maui coconut milk products so I like the sent. This one was a little soapy smell ing when you put it on but great when it dries. Great for any kind of styling.❤❤❤❤❤👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Good hold but tacky like texture when drying
Review: Love the smell of this product and it does have a nice hold for my wavy hair. Only complaint is when I plop my hair for drying, the product gets an odd tacky feel for my curls. This is best used with a diffuser to dry out the product as best as possible to avoid the tacky texture.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: The best I have ever had
Review: My hair is extremely dry and I really appreciate that this product holds my curls without drying my hair. I use a pump of curl cream and then apply this product to the soaking wet hair. Then, I use a diffuser to dry my hair. Voila!

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Great Product
Review: Great product smells like coconut.  No flakes. I could wear it for a 5 days straight before I need to wash my hair. Lightweight without the tough scaley look. Hair is so soft and frizzless. And, my hair is the curly frizzy type. I used to need to wash other mousse products out of my hair every night. This product saves so much time needing to wash and style my hair.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: label
Review: No where on the bottle does it say it is free of any or all  alcohol products, I was hoping to find a hair product that will help with the frizz control and define my curls more. This product is no different . Hope to find the right one soon.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Light Nicw scent hair moisturizing
Review: I was happy with product.  I was not happy the way it was shipped as they were not sealed and caps loose so they leaked.The scent was nice it worked well at moisturizing and was light weight not heavy weighing down hair. I was not happy the way it was shipped.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Great for unruly , curly hair
Review: I tried this product for the first time , and I will now only use this mousse.  It is light, not heavy, love the scent, does not build up in my hair, and works very well in controlling my curls!

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Order this NOW!
Review: My daughter got me started on the Maui shampoo and conditioner, so I decided to use their curling products as I have naturally curly hair. THIS IS BY FAR MY FAVORITE CURLING PRODUCT EVER!  My curls are light and bouncy!

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Made my hair totally flat. I would not buy agajn
Review: Too much coconut oil. My hair was totally flat and felt dirty. I personally would not recommend!

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: If crispy is good….
Review: Soft curls?? Applied a small amount in my damp hair this morning, root to tip. Left my hair to dry naturally. Clumps of hair we’re stuck together and ‘crispy’ to touch- not the look I was going for… the search continues

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Smells great but left my hair crunchy
Review: LOVED the smell but it left my hair a little crunchy. In fairness I have very frizzy, curly, long and thick hair it takes a lot to control my mane. Goes a long way tho. I could see someone with shorter hair getting a lot of use out of the bottle

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: I'd recommend
Review: -This is an extremely light hold so if you want a more defined curl or smooth neat look, you'll need a different mousse.-The coconut scent last for 2 seconds.-Does not moisturize.-Leaves hands sticky-Good price

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Not for me
Review: The product smells good and it is really light. It didn't work for me, though. Didn't hold like I thought it would and I have fine hair. Didn't moisturize like I hoped.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Love love love it. Smells great, flexible hold
Review: It is so hard to find a curly hair "hold" without the "crunchy" feeling. This has great hold. No stiffness. Smells great. It is a huge bottle. Would highly recommend.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Not greasy or stiff
Review: Like the smell, the way it makes my hair feel.It's lightweight and doesn't make your hair look greasy.Good for taming my wavy hair and flyaway.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Love it!
Review: I love this mousse. It smells amazing and it holds perfectly. Also,  it's the 1st mousse I've found that is a pump and not aerosolized (if that makes sense). I've purchased this a few times now. Will definitely buy again!

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Love it!
Review: Smells wonderful and works well for my fine curls.  I just don't need very much.  It keeps them looking nice all day and the scent doesn't stay with you all day.  The price is good and I highly recommend!

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Great Brand. Happy with all their products

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Dries out my curls
Review: I have kinky, thick, curly hair. When I first tried out this product it was honestly OK. It didnt really do much that surprised me. For some reason on my next wash day this product made my hair DRY. My hair had moisture in it, but when I added this product , I can literally feel my hair go from moisturize to straight up DRY.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Yes

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Works very well in my hair.

But I have to say I love this one and it works very well with my hair. If you want something with moisturizer and light weight this is the product for you.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz

Review: I like this mousse, but it does give your curls that crunchy texture that I was hoping to avoid. However, it’s a decent product that is vegan and for that I will continue to use it.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Didn’t work for my curly hair
Review: Did work for my curly hair. I thought it would be more moisturizing, especially with aloe as the first ingredient. It’s very drying and heavy. Maybe more for wavy hair versus coarse curly hair.

Title: Smells Good!!!
Review: This product smells nice!! Make sure not to place too much on if you don't want crunchy hair. Does hold good. Would use it again.

Title: It's like super glue

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Maui Moisture's Curl Foam Mousse has a beautiful blue bottle with a golden color, foaming pump dispenser with a super colorful and informative product label with crisp, cool and refreshing ingredients graphically pictured.Infused with coconut milk and Aloe vera and mango butter, this product hair such an amazing tropical scent that smells just like the  natural ingredients that's in it.This is one of the more light and airy foam mousse products that I've ever used in  my hair. It helps me achieve better looking and feeling, natural  curls with no-crunch and flexible hold.It seems to help define and retain my natural curls while adding a little bit of volume to my hair. It definitely has helped decrease the amount.if frizz my hair tends to have. Especially, when it's too humid outdoors.*The label states 100 Percent Aloe Vera as the FIRST Ingredient of this mousse not water or alcohol like some hair mousse products I've used.CONCLUDING,This airy lightweight, vegan formula  hair mousse by Maui Moisture smells divine, works miracles on my natural curls without being sticky or leaving white residue behind. It quenches my curls making them look and feel hydrated and healthy. The infusion of coconut milk and mango butter has given my long curly locks  the moisture it needs without weighing  them down.This is an absolute WINNER!!

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: TOP 50 REVIEWER
Review: If you want a lightweight styler with no crunch, this foam mousse is for you. The first ingredient is aloe vera, so it won't leave your hair feeling stiff or hard. It defines curls in a softer manner. For that reason, I think it's perfect for rod sets. You can also use it if you already have a strong hold gel in your hair as a refresher. The scent is light and pleasant. The formula is a bit sticky, but it rinses off easily. I highly recommend this product.Thanks so much for taking the time to read this review.  I hope the information that I've provided helps make your decision a little easier.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: # My ReviewThis review is for Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse. My wife has long, curly hair that dries out easily, loses volume / depth, and is difficult to manage. With that in mind, she’s tried many styling mousses from various brands and it’s either been hit or miss. It’s the first time she’s using any Maui Moisture product and the results were a pleasant surprise.First of all, the mousse is delivered in a relatively strong blue and gold colored bottle with the Maui Moisture branding and details of the ingredients, formula, directions of use, etc. clearly defined on the front & back. The product branding is clear, concise, and on point, so you can easily see why you’d use this product.The mousse is very easy to use on dry or wet hair. First of all, the pump delivers an even amount of mousse that can be applied as needed. A little goes a long way with this hair product, so don’t overdo it. The mousse has a consistency and viscosity that’s semi thick, and produces a considerable amount of foam. Once applied it covers the hair nicely and isn’t sticky or gel like. There’s an awesome scent that’s fresh and invigorating - not overwhelming.Overall, the mousse does a great job creating naturally looking curls that aren’t stiff or crunchy. The specialized blend does a good job of making curly hair more manageable, naturally looking, and defined with volume. Looking at the product details, quality, and price point, it’s also reasonably good value. I recommend.If you found this review informative, then please click on the “[Helpful]” button to let me know to continue providing these unbiased and in-depth reviews for this community. Thank You.# Please Note:This review is written in good faith and for general information purposes only.You are reading and using the information detailed in this review at your own risk. This review is based on my opinion and you should determine whether this product is right for your purposes using your own research and conclusions.Do not take any of the information presented here as professional advice, it is purely based on personal opinion. I do not make any warranties about the completeness, reliability and accuracy of this information. Any action you take upon the information in this review, is strictly at your own risk and free will.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This foam mousse ends up feeling more like a crunchy, yet somehow sticky gel after it dries. It makes my hair a bit too crunchy and it dried out my ends terribly. I try to use even lesser amounts and avoid the ends a bit, but I still end up not liking the finished results too much. It does keep the shape of your curls and actually seems to spring them up a bit, but the excessive drying is just too much. For a product that is supposed to be better for your hair, it sure does do some damage. Along with the crunch, it's just too much.It pumps out nicely into a nice foamy mousse. I didn't have any complaints about dispensing or anything like that. It's just that it does things to my hair that I definitely try to avoid.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: First off, my bottle came all crunched with product leaked out all over it, so they need to put this in a box so that doesn’t happen. Or, use a stronger bottle. Since it’s vacuum packed, there’s no way to release the pressure so it will always be crunched in like this. It still works, I just had to clean off all the sticky product that had dried all over it. The mousse is light, like most are, and has a light tropical smell that goes away fairly quick. I have naturally wavy hair so this is great if I just want more of a beach waves look as opposed to more curly hair, which I have to use a curl gel for. This doesn’t make my hair crunchy at all and if I use it the next day, after getting my hair damp, it doesn’t seem to cause build up that weighs it down. This is pretty much what most mousse does to my hair. I like that this has quality ingredients that help keep my hair moisturized instead of drying it out. This will be a nice alternative to the curl gel on days when I just want some light waves.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I have very fine, somewhat dry, curly hair. It tends to frizz especially when I've color, so I like a little bit of something to help control the frizz. I hope this would be a good product for that and while it does help control frizz it does leave my hair looking a little bit greasy. If I messed it up enough but it doesn't look greasy it goes back to being frizzy.The smell is nice, reminds me of the seaside and sunscreen can I get triggered into headaches from smell fairly easily.So not really what I'm looking for but I imagine if you have thicker denser hair this stuff might work really well for you.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This is wrapped in plastic, with good reason as it leaked in shipment. The bottle was actually sucked in, like it had been through a pressure change, and I had to open it to get it back to it's normal shape. I had to rinse it and let it air dry as well since it was covered in leaked product. I used it in my hair today. It is not as lightweight as I'd anticipated and I think four pumps was too much for my shoulder-length hair. It smells wonderful and is giving me the look I'd hoped for. I like that it avoids the same harmful toxins that I do.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I review a lot of hair products for Vine - both because I like hair products and because that's what they offer me. The problem is, it's hard to review hair products. Different products work differently for different people and also react differently with other products. So I end up giving most things 4 stars.This foam spreads a little easier than mousse, like most foams. It's pretty pleasant to use and the curls are good. I personally like a bit more hold, but they don't call it strong hold, so the light hold is expected.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have pretty thick long curly hair, it is down to the middle of my back with it is dry.  This mousse is very light.  For a firm hold this isn't that great for my hairs thickness/weight.  It didn't overly dry out my hair it didn't keep up with it all day.  For a relaxing day or hangout day it would be a better option.The smell is nice but a bit strong if you are not a coconut fan you won't like it.It isn't super expensive and does work its just not for everyday use for me.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: dries out my curls
Review: As a person letting mother nature's highlights grow in I already have the dryness that comes with gray hair.  That plus curly hair means that I am always adding moisture. This mousse held my hair fine but it made my curls even more dry.  I also wasn't able to refresh the 2nd day curls as easily with this product.  I use a gel from this company that I love so I guess it is just hit or miss with their products.  The price is what drew me to this product but it is not for me and my curly grays.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Smells pleasant, makes great wavy scrunchy curls in my normally straight long hair. I apply when hair is still wet. It does make curls have a bit of crunch so it is a bit drying. I only do my hair in a scrunchy curl every few weeks so this is ok with me, but I realize if I used this on a daily basis I feel like my hair would get pretty dried out and have some buildup. That being said based on the price point it does the job and I would order it again.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Unexpected Results
Review: Whenever there are new products out there for curly hair, I like to try them. This product I was a little skeptical about, but I was proven wrong. I didn't think it would be able to keep my curls looking good and frizz-free. but it did. And it's so much lighter than the gels I've been using. Perfect for summer. I'm really glad I found this.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This mousse is lightweight, offers just enough hold but doesn't leave my curls crunchy or feeling bare. I like the scent, its a very tropical, fruity scent. I normally let my hair air-dry and this worked well to keep it neat and keep it from puffing out on me. I also noticed it didn't leave any white flakes on my scalp when I move my roots around, which is fantastic.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I love the coconut smell of this mousse. The consistency of the mousse is a little weird though. When I try to apply it to wet hair, the mousse wants to stick on my hands and doesn't transfer onto my hands very well. Once in my hair this product gives my hair body for DAYSSS. No crunchy feeling but my hair does feel heavy with product afterwards.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Smells amazing! The scent is not overpowering. It smells like sweet fruits. I used this with my daughter, who has loose curls that easily become frizzy. It did not take much product to use on my daughters hair. Her hair was not stiff or sticky. Her hair was not frizzy but Sadly it did not do much to enhance her curls.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I love the control you have when you dispense this mousse.  You can get just the amount you need rather than the bottle giving you a huge squirt all at once.  The scent is very pleasant, and I appreciate the moisturizing ingredients as I have rather dry hair.  I would say that it has a medium hold.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: The mousse smells nice and it is very light weight. The mouse will work great on people who have wavy curls. I need a more sturdier hold.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This is lighter than any other mousse I have tried. It does not weigh my curls down at all. I love the smell and how light and airy it is. I have been using this with the gel and curl refresher spray and my hair looks very healthy and shiny.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: TOP 50 REVIEWER
Review: Much larger than expected.Cruelty free, always a plus.Aloe vera is the first ingredient.Smells really nice. Smells like Hawaii!It leaked, but I can just wipe it off.I'll report back if there are any issues.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Works beautiful
Review: Love the product

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: There is alcohol
Review: False advertisement. If you look at the ingredients, there is alcohol denat.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Great for curls and retwist
Review: I use this for my locs and it holds pretty well. It’s been 2 weeks and my retwist still looks nice. I also use this for my 3 year olds curls with some leave in and looks good. This stuff is sticky that’s the only thing I don’t like but I love that the main ingredient is aloe Vera. It’s the reason I bought it instead of using the aloe gel for my retwist. Gets an A from me.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Needs Better Packaging
Review: Amazon really needs to pack liquids better. My bottle DID NOT have a top on it, so about an inch of the liquid was all over the other items in my box.  It didn't have bubble wrap or anything. Just a bottle with no top banging against the box and dripping everywhere.  As far as the actual product, it has a nice scent and works well...but I hate dealing with a sticky mess on everything else.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Heavy heavy heavy
Review: I wanted this for beach waves but it’s so heavy it weighs down even the slightest wave. Not much hold at all and whatever you get while wet, goes away pretty quickly.I have 2c hair (thick, coarse, more s-wave than curl) and this pales in comparison to what salt spray can do. To be fair, this probably moisturizes better though.Smells good, but not worth it.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Leaves hair greasy
Review: I’m redoing this reviews and giving it 2 stars. It does hold my wavy/curly hair nicely but it leaves my hair SO greasy and gross feeling. I can usually go a few days between Washing my hair but when I use this I have to wash my hair nightly and it still feels gross afterwards.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Made my hair sticky
Review: Weighed my hair down and made it feel sticky. Saw some great reviews on Youtube so thought I would try it on my wavy hair... did not make my hair look good just greasy and messy.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Better than nice !
Review: Great hold. Nice soft scent. Not drying like some others I have tried. Extremely satisfied with my purchase and will purchase again !

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: I finally found my mousse
Review: I have thick very long hair and highlights in it...,Can not have anything drying, but love my hair in hot roller style. This mousse is perfect.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Good for 3C curls
Review: There are mixed reviews, probably because this only works for certain hair types. I have 3C hair and this works great. Makes my curls soft and defined with no crunch. I apply a little bit and then finger curl. Good value for money as well.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Smells good
Review: Lovely smell and provides moisture without the crunch

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Your hair will enjoy it.
Review: I really enjoy Maui products. This one is no exception. It smells good. It's light weight. Your hair will love it.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: It's a really convenient product. Quick for on the go too. Not messy

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Great!!

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Curls

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: buy it
Review: good

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Hair doesn't block my eyes
Review: The pic without my beard tied is me straight out the shower with no product in and pre combed. The one where I'm still shirtless but my beard is braided is also before any product but combed. Hair still wet in both. The 3rd pic is with maui mousse in after going to Walmart for over an hour to buy it and other shopping. This is my first time ever growing my hair out so I don't have any experience with any other product but I can tell you that it keeps my hair out of my face significantly. Before using this, all my hair would be in my face with just a slight angle downward of my head and after using this it keeps most of it in place. It feels like my hair is wet yet it's dry. Not like watery, but how wet hair feels minus the water. The scent is a mild coconut. It keeps hair from blocking my vision like a shaggy dog and that's all I wanted it for, but it's also lightweight and has good ingredients. I don't regret my purchase

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Loving it❤️
Review: I and my daughter use this. I shake and pump about 4 to 5 skirts. Hair feels soft and smells great. When hair is completely dry..I then scrunch..hair looks fuller and curls are defined.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Texture of hair was okay
Review: Did the job, but I was not a fan of the smell. It was very coconut like but if you like that it’s perfect. Usually my hair gets crunchier with these type of products but it didn’t do that with this. It just kept it a bit wet like for the remainder of the day. I probably won’t buy it again.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: I do not recommend
Review: I used this product daily. Next day,….My hair felt damaged. This product smells great and feels great the same it’s used but me personally I noticed my hair just kept feeling more dry the more I used it, and breakage started with continued used. I had high hopes for this product with its limited ingredients. But it just wasn’t good for me.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Great
Review: This product made my curls pop. No buildup or residue. Will purchase again.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: A little goes a long way!
Review: Love the smell. To add lift to your hair, tilt your hair forward and spray at half an arms length. Than put hair in desired style and spray gently.  Love this product.  I have naturally curly hair.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Works so well
Review: I bought this for my hair not Sure how it would work. I was looking to replace a product I really liked but is no longer available. I have a thick curly hair and I put it in when it’s wet it dries with soft curls and I love it. My hair is still soft and it’s not crunchy at all.It doesn’t give the volume that the other product did but it’s really good. I do use a light volumizing spray on it if I want extra volume. I like that it’s natural it has a little bit of a smell but not much and it’s such a great find. I would totally recommend you try it.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Dried out my hair
Review: The scent was good but made my hair frizzy and dried it out and had to throw it out. True it three times

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: NOT Curly Girl Method Approved - contains drying alcohol
Review: Alcohol Denat is a drying alcohol that is listed in the ingredients. Soooo.... this product does contain a drying alcohol even though it says contains NO drying alcohol... making it not Curly Girl Method approved. Just FYI.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: it's like foamy soap
Review: Don't waste your money.  Not worth it

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Sooo helpful for my hectic curly hair journey
Review: Such a good mousse!! I've been working on figuring out how to treat my curls, and it's been hit or miss until I found this product. Here are the...PROS: 1. It literally smells so good, for DAYS. Any person with curly hair knows you don't wash your hair every day, but sometimes you want that good "freshly washed" smell even on day 3. This really does that. It's not "perfumey" or over the top, it's just really good smelling.2. It really, actually works. It doesn't make my hair crunchy or stringy once it's dry and scrunched out, instead it leaves behind soft, gentle curls. I can run my hands through my hair after using this and the curls maintain their shape.3. It enhances shine and keeps away frizz.4. It doesn't build up and cause heavy, dull hair.5. It's so much cheaper than the comparable brands.CONS: I really don't have any. The bottle is pretty and spill proof, you don't have to use too much of it so it lasts a good while, it's easy to wash out.....there are no cons yet. I will update this if there are!I hope this review was helpful! I've gone through soooo many products to find ones that work, I hope I can shorten that process for you!

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Smells good, works good
Review: I have wavy hair at the moment, natural hair is curly but damaged from all the heat, so I'm giving my hair a break from that trying to restore my curly hair and this works great to tame the frizz smells pretty good too

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Smells great, but it didn’t work for me.
Review: Smells really good, but this product had my hair badly matted together. Took me three hours to detangle. I recommend this product to people with short hair.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Best Mouse ever. Wish I found it earlier.
Review: I love this product.  I use it daily and no longer need hairspray to keep my hair in place.  I wish I would have found this earlier

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Made my hair frizzy
Review: This made my hair frizzy with absolutely no hold. I will be returning this product.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Works really well!
Review: This stuff work!!! It smells so good too!!

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Frizzy
Review: The sent was amazing but it did not work well at keeping my curls from being a frizzy mess.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Smells so good!
Review: I love this product.  It’s like a mousse, but so light, and not crunchy and keeps my permed curls frizz free and touchable. You don’t have to use too much product to manage your curls.  Too much and it has a “wet look” even when dry.  Love this product!  Will definitely buy again.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Not my favorite
Review: Doesn’t really work on my thick/curly/dense hair…

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Really has a great hold
Review: I wanted a product alcohol free for my hair.  This works absolutely great. Hair is not hard after using this product.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: It’s not Mousse
Review: Honestly it makes your hair feel sticky and it doesn’t hold your hair into curls, could be just my hair but I don’t like the consistency of it. I won’t be buying again

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: I hate to get ripped off
Review: I saw an ad on instagram for a similar product but it was sold out. This one popped up on Amazon. It was not very expensive and had good reviews. I ordered not expecting much. But it is amazing!!! I'm 62 and I've noticed my lush curls have been thinning and losing their " oomph."  This brought my hair back to life! It looks like a lion's mane! It smells fresh and most importantly, it's not sticky or crunchy. At first it feels like it might be but it dries soft and bouncy. I mostly air dry but I diffused the roots holding my head upside down. Sounds crazy but adds volume. I DID NOT get ripped off and I am ordering more!!!

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: So disappointed!
Review: I got this product and really loved it. I didn't use it again for a month or two and it will NOT foam up at all now, making it unusable. I wanted to contact the seller to see if a replacement can be sent from them but it is apparently shipped and sold from Amazon directly and is outside the return/exchange window. So disappointed because I was really looking forward to using this again.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: It smells good but it’s sticky
Review: It loved the smell but it was really sticky

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: I was surprised at the size of this bottle. It’s way bigger than most mousse products I’ve used. I love the consistency but I do wish the product had a slightly better hold. I normally use gel to set my curls on wash days & was hoping to use this instead but it’s doesn’t hold my curls as well. It works good for in between washes, it’s light & airy so it doesn’t weigh down your hair.

Product: Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: Love how it kept its promise, of maintaining curls for dry hair and say it off @nikkinelms IG.Unfortunately as shown in the pic, packaging didn’t travel well and half the bottle got lieaked while in transit.Can I suggest the brand taping the pink boxed area to prevent any leakage during delivery?

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Makes hair fall out Google it!!!
Review: This product made my hair fall out it has DMDM Hydantoin and Formaldehyde as ingredients. Class action lawsuits against this in products. I’m trying to send it back to seller but $20.99 to ship back. It’s defective why Can’t I get my money back??

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: SO GOOD!
Review: I’ve been using this for about a month now and holy moly!!! It smells sooooo good and my hair is NOTICEABLY shinier + softer!  I have thick, curly hair and was kind of skeptical of this product but it’s definitely worth the money!

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Don't use if you have sensitive skin!!!!
Review: I got both the shampoo and conditioner. They both smelled great. When I actually used them, they didn't feel as good as I had hope, and I kind of had a reaction to the product. My scalp, neck, ears, and face got red and hot. I don't think there was anything specific in the product that I'm usually sensitive to- it's just a really intense product. The ingredients are natural, but too much of a good thing isn't a good thing. Definitely don't use if you have sensitive skin!! It took an hour-long cold shower and lots of my old shampoo to get the product completely out and to calm my skin. I was really excited about this product, but it's definitely not for me.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: It’s open
Review: Super mad It’s not full to the top I think it use

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Very shiny hair after one use
Review: Used it only once but I like it. My hair is very shiny.I have colored hair and it worked well for my hair.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Smells so good
Review: This is my first Maui Moisture purchase but it definitely won’t be the last. This shampoo smells heavenly and it leaves my hair looking amazing.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: cancer
Review: first this shampoo is horriblemy hair were more dull after I used it than beforeI was surprise because of the excellent reviewI am a vegan and I usually do my research on chemicals used in a product I did not do my "home work" this timemy badso I did it now, too lateI wish I could return itthis product has Diazolidinyl Urea, which is another name for formaldehyde. This is highly toxic and it is believed to cause cancerwhat do you expect from a corporation !

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Its o.k.
Review: Im not crazy about this shampoo.  The scent is faint, and i don't feel like my hair was anymore moisturized after using it.The conditioner however is extremely rich and thick, again scent very faint.I just noticed the other day that my walmart carries several different kinds of this brand at a cheaper price.  I might try a different one at the walmart price.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Bad shipping
Review: Bottle came about 3/4 of the way full, lid was open and leaked all over the box. The smell is much more floral compared to other Maui products. Left a bit of a residue on my hair but otherwise okay.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Might be perfect for you!
Review: I wanted to try this out to see if I could get more healthy shine in my hair but I did not, I also didn't feel that my hair was moisturized from it, BUT, I have curly hair that constantly needs heavy moisturizing products because it always gets dry. I've been consistently using the pinkish/purple maui moisture which feels perfect in my hair. I recommend trying it though anyways because it may make your hair beautiful!

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Heavenly smell
Review: This stuff is amazing and I’ve never smelt anything like it. The smell is my favorite part about this but it has so many great qualities. It’s very thick so you can make this last awhile. I’d describe the scent as citrus based, like a grapefruit. I’m not sure what awapuhi is but I imagine that’s what gives it it’s great smell! This is my fav conditioner from Maui but I also love the pink and purple conditioners as well! All great scents and work amazingly!

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: AMAZING
Review: I love all of Maui's products!! I switched to their brand in December and after a few weeks of adjusting my hair looks better than it ever has, the scent is incredible! I wash my hair every 6 days and it smells good all the way up until I wash it again. I TOTALLY RECOMMEND it'll take a while if you've never used a product that doesn't contain sls and all those other gross chemicals that are found in most common drugstore shampoos to adjust but it's so worth it!

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Great floral/fruity scent.
Review: I've always loved Maui Moisture for my colored hair. Sulfate free, with fragrance as the last ingredient. Smells great, with the quality of product and results I expect from this brand. Will definitely purchase this scent again.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Smells amazing!
Review: Ok, so I'm going on almost two weeks of using this shampoo. I decided to continue using it since I wasn't very satisfied the first day I tried it. I just love the way this product smells and is conveniently affordable! I have thick, coarse, dull hair that could use some TLC. After a week of using it, I felt my hair slightly softer. My hair looked a little shiny too, but there wasn't a huge difference overall.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Not what I expected
Review: If you are looking for something that smells like Paul Mitchell Awaphui, this is NOT it.  Not the greatest shampoo in my opinion.  Smell was not what I expected and I wasn't terribly happy with the results from using it.  Please understand that I am weighting much of my rating on the fact that the smell was nothing like I expected and that may be unfair.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Great value and the smell is nice also
Review: The shampoo do not need to use a lot to lathered on your hair, the smell is good. I am being fair to give 4 Stars because the shampoos came leaked in the shipping box. I ordered three and I asked Amazon to replaced at least one of them even though they all leaked. They need to be sealed really well possibly double check to prevent the leakage.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Hair never feels clean.
Review: I love that it doesn't have sulfates and it smells delicious! But it leaves my hair feeling unwashed instead of clean and I've suddenly gotten dandruff since using it. Unfortunately, my sulfate shampoos Don't do this. Like my previous organic vegan shampoos I'll probably use it as a shower wash. Disappointed.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Smells juicy!
Review: This is a fairly standard shampoo. It cleans well, rinses out well, does it's job. It smells AMAZING. Very strong citrus, fruity smell. My only problem is that it smells so real that it makes me thirsty every time I use it. Seriously. My husband absolutely loves the smell.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: It works!
Review: I'm a skeptic by nature, but this does what it says it will do. I've processed my hair for years so it often feels a little dry. This shampoo made it feel softer and gave it more shine. It leathers well and rinses easily.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: make hair soft
Review: I love the scent, it makes my hair shiny and it is my first choice from the MAUI line... but it is difficult to find this particular one...so most of the time you have to pay more for this one! also it is little heavy so good for my straight hair but maybe not for everybody...

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Doesn’t get hairspray out?? Or moisturize
Review: Used for couple of days, does not remove hairspray from hair or moisturize. Trying a more expensive shampoo and conditioner.. will see, it has great reviews!

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Not too happy
Review: Really disappointed with this product I have bought this product several times from other merchants and it was an excellent I love it. But this product is very watery I can only assume that it's with a returned item and has been watered down

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Never again
Review: One of the worst products, drys my hair out so bad.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Smells soooooooo good!!!
Review: This shampoo smells incredible!!! It also lathers really well. Unfortunately, this particular formula dries out my scalp and makes it itch horribly. The other formulas don't dry me out so I'm not sure why this one does. :(

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: It is okay
Review: I like the feel of this while my hair is still wet.  It allows me to get the knots out easily, isn't sticky at all and the smell isn't bad either.  Though, once my hair dries, there's not a noticeable difference in the moisture level and before you know it my hair is back to being frizzy.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: DRIED MY HAIR & SMELLS LIKE DOG SHAMPOO NOT LIKE AWAPUHI
Review: DRIED MY HAIR & SMELLS LIKE DOG SHAMPOO NOT LIKE AWAPUHI. HAD TO USE A LOT JUST TO COMB OUT MY HAIR TO GET OUT THE TANGLES.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Nice
Review: Very nice and nourishing conditioner for dry hair. Smell is ok, but not terrible. Makes my hair feel really soft after using and helps to detangle.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Very moisturizing
Review: I love it!Every time I’ve tried a different conditioner, I keep coming back to this one. None I’ve tried so far match up to how moisturizing this one is.I only wish they had a bulk option for it. I hate how quickly I go through the bottles.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Smells Great.
Review: Love this stuff!! It works. My hair smells great!! The only issue I have is the price. It’s not worth almost 7 bucks! I most likely will not buy it again.  Unless it is on sale

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Great for Daily Use
Review: Cleans and moisturizes hair. Very gentle and you can use this shampoo every day. I really like this shampoo, makes hair soft and shiny. Will continue to use. The conditioner works great, it detangles hair and it a great moisturizer. Highly recommend products.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Scent to strong
Review: When I got the product it leaked everywhere my entire box and everything else and it smelt like the shampoo and conditioner I believe the scent is too strong so if you’re sensitive to strong smells this isn’t for you.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Good switch to use from normal curl management system
Review: Smells good, cleans well without stripping but of you have dry hair be sure to use both shampoo and conditioner.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Love this!
Review: I do Love this moisturizing Conditioner is quite thick.  I need that. Let it sink in for 5-10 minutes & Softer easy to comb through my mid back length hair.  Try it!

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: GOOD product, BAD handling (read)
Review: This is a WONDERFUL product and I love it. But the manufacturer keeps sending me bottle that are contained in plastic with the lid OFF. I had to replace the first time I purchased bc so much product had spilt out and the even the replacement I received was also spilt with the cap off. This is a great product, but PLEASE make sure that caps on on tightly for delivery.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Island Bliss Conditioner
Review: Pros: Love this product, from smell and on my hair.Cons: Not pkd well arrived with conditioner leaking out out

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Did I get someone’s return?
Review: Bottle was not protected by plastic wrapping and one was leaking. Seems like they’ve been opened before. Gross. Also I know it’s not the product that is effected but it’s a little “iffy” when the bottles packaging doesnt match.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Hair loss
Review: I’ve always had very thick hair and never had to worry about thinning or hair loss. After using this shampoo 3-4 times, I starting noticing my hair was thinning and I literally had a bald spot on my scalp. Idk what’s in this product but I would not recommend. I was so confused when this happened and I came back to these reviews and saw that other people had the same issue

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: good value
Review: smells nicedetangles welllightweight on my fine hairno irritation for sensitive skin

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Shampoo horrible. Conditioner amazing.
Review: Smells great. Love the conditioner but the shampoo doesn't lather. Shampoo is super thick and takes alot to wash hair. The conditioner is lightweight and smells amazing.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: The awapui one has lovely all natural ingredients that smell & feels nice on the hair.
Review: The bottle leaked and did not have a seal. So I lost shampoo. It’s a hassle to return things. Though Amazon is good about that. I read Others had this complaint too. My husband and I like the scent and clean soft feel of our hair using the shampoo conditioner.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Terrible Smell
Review: I am a HUGE FAN of Maui Products so this totally disappointed me .. yes the outcome of smoothness and such was there but the wonderful scents I expect from Maui was not… it was just terrible… I will stick with the Coconut 🥥 one

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Smells good, cleanses well and doesn’t have silicone or sulfate!
Review: Smells good and is easy to lather. The shampoo feels jelly/aloe like more than liquid. I got this to help cleanse my hair since it doesn’t have silicone or sulfate.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Wonderful Shine
Review: I have bought other shampoos that promise shine, but none of them could compare to this.  My hair has never looked better

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Just right
Review: I have dry hair and often after using a product for a while it just doesn't work, this is really good and I've been using for last 5 months now and i like how my hair feels.  Sensitive to scents and this doesn't bother me and I don't find it lingers after a short time which I like.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Quality not there for me.
Review: Dried my hair out. Felt like cheap shampoo.

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: No Seal, Product Spilled, Bottle Sticky?!
Review: No seal, 1/2 spilled out, bottle sticky. Threw Out

Product: Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuhi Moisturizing Vegan Shampoo with Coconut Oils for Shiny Hair, Silicone-Free & Sulfate-Free Surfactant Aloe Shampoo to Detangle & Hydrate Dull Hair, 13 fl. Oz
Title: Wonderful fragrance!
Review: I purchased this Maui Moisture Shine + Awapuh & love the fragrance. It cleans my hair, gives it a beautiful shine and oh, did I mention it smells great? Love this stuff!
