Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Gentle, smells nice, lightweight for those of us with oily scalps
Review: For reference, I have 1B hair, thick, pretty straight and never dyed it in my life. My scalp gets oily and therefore I lack volume. My scalp is also prone to irritation so it’s hard to find a shampoo that cleans without stripping and weighing it down. Alas, this is a nice shampoo to use and is lightweight. It imparts a pleasant and non overpowering smell also, whilst it doesn’t contribute to irritation in any way. Super gentle.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Smells amazing
Review: I love the fragrance of this, it smells so good. The only bummer was that it arrived with a chunk of the cap broken. It was sealed within its own bag, and not too much product leaked out but still, I hope they're more careful next time with packaging.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: HOLY GRAIL!!!! Low porosity life saver!!
Review: I've tried so many products from Olaplex to every natural/sulfate free shampoo and conditioner to mend my super dry low porosity hair (I don't color, I barely use heat, but my ends get so dry and have breakage from previous keratin treatments) and within ONE wash - my hair literally went from feeling dead and dry from the neck down to being the softest and healthiest my hair has ever felt all the way down to my ends!!! It has so much life and movement - all the dryness and frizz are GONE. Literally can't believe the results for the price, it feels like my hair went through a $200 conditioning treatment I'm obsessed!!!!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Best choice made in 2020!
Review: I used Pantene ProV for year. My hair would always feel heavy a day after shampooing. I noticed my hair would fall out more frequently and became lack luster. I changed over to this product November 2020 and haven’t looked back since. This was the best change my hair needed speaking directly a 40year old woman. Hair doesn’t fall out as much, it feels lighter and I can go 3-4 days without washing and it smells fantastic!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: I wanted to like this way more than I do, but...
Review: I was looking for a new shampoo and conditioner because even though my old one worked well for me (Hair Food: coconut & chai), I get bored and want new scents. My cousin recommended me this brand.I wanted to like this way more than I do, but the scent just doesn't do it for me. I definitely thought it would smell more watermelon-y, which I would have loved, but it has a weird scent to it that just doesn't appeal to me. It isn't BAD, just not my favorite.While it does make my hair feel and look nice, it's back to falling out a ton. The ONLY shampoo/conditioner that I haven't had that happen on was my Hair Food one, so I guess I'm just going to go back to that one.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Too thick, gave me bad dandruff, horrid product
Review: I've been using clean products for about a year now, still trying to find a curly hair friendly shampoo that doesn't weigh it down. This shampoo has amazing reviews... How???First off it's so thick it's difficult to get out of the bottle, let alone get it to stay on my hair. It slips right off.Second, everything about my hair and scalp were fine. I just wanted to find a better shampoo... This shampoo is the only thing I changed in my routine and it gave me horrible dandruff. Like, burning itching, redness.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Gave this an honest try, but it's a no.
Review: I used this product for two months before writing this review, because I really, really wanted to like it. But I can't. Since I started using this product - the only change I've made - my hair has become dryer, doesn't look clean for as long as it used to, and has been knotting more. The skin along my hairline and wear my hair touches has also been getting more acne than it used to. You can find better shampoo for the same price, if not cheaper. The only thing it has going for it is its smell.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Not for oily scalps
Review: When I read "lightweight hydration" I thought this would be great for my oily scalp and dry ends but unfortunately, this shampoo is pretty terrible at getting my hair clean.And I have been using this for a few weeks now, testing it as much as I could. I've used a method where I lather and apply to my scalp and then add more to my ends to get rid of build up. It still didn't get my hair clean.The thing is, if you have an oily scalp and sulfates don't necessarily bother you or irritate your skin, then you might as well go for a shampoo that has sulfates because it does help in cleaning and getting rid of excess oil.I would recommend this for people with normal to dry hair. If you have an oily scalp that's prone to build up like mine, this shampoo won't help.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Love it!
Review: Very nice and lightweight for my straight and low porosity hair. A lot of the other shampoos I've tried is either very heavy or gives me a product buildup. This is one of the few shampoos that works well with my hair. It is sulfate-free. While this is great, if you do not use enough water, it can be difficult to use. It can create buildup. But if you saturate your hair enough, it should be okay.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Made my hair dry
Review: Ive been using this shampoo for over a month now and i thought i liked it at first but i've realized my hair has become BEYOND dry/frizzy after drying from this shampoo. To deal with this problem i've been using the Shea Moisture Jamaican black castor oil leave-in-conditioner so i think im going to switch to that brand of shampoo/conditioner and see what happens.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Seems to leave a lot of oil behind
Review: My hair builds up oil pretty quickly, so I chose the less moisturizing end of the Maui Moisture spectrum when I chose this shampoo, thinking it would do well with removing dirt and oil.Not really. It seems to leave a bit of a slippery film behind, which made my hair feel kind of sticky and not entirely clean.The smell is lovely, and that's about all I liked about it. I used the rest as a body wash.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Consistency feels off. Like gel
Review: I usually buy this shampoo in store, but I figured it wouldn’t hurt to order off of Amazon. Shampoo came in and as I tried to squeeze it out of the bottle, it came out in a harder consistency than normal, almost like gel. It doesn’t not prevent my hair from being greasy the next day like it normally does. Not sure if my bottle is expired or made incorrectly. disappointed though.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: not good for wavy hair
Review: i really wanted to love this, it was recommended to me because it’s supposed to be good for wavy/curly hair. at first it was okay but the more i kept using it the more it weighed down my hair and made my hair dry straight. my hair got super dry and knotted super easily with this. the scent is nice but the texture makes it super hard to rub together

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Love!
Review: I have thin, fine, damaged, highlighted hair. This shampoo and conditioner as a set works very well to hydrate my dry ends while cleaning my scalp and hair. I do have an oily scalp which makes it hard to find a good enough shampoo that will clean my hair but not over strip it. This is a perfect balance! The scent is also really subtle but nice!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Do not reccomend!!!
Review: This product made a lot of my hair fall out and overall very dry.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: This shampoo is WORTH IT, but shipping issues
Review: GREAT shampoo! I have curly, fine hair and it is so hard to find something that is truly LIGHTWEIGHT moisture and this is it. It always sells out in my local stores so I ordered it this time- this shampoo is that good. 12/10 on the poo, However! My bottle was half empty due to spilling while shipping. Hopefully they get something figured out because spending that much on half a bottle of shampoo isn't my jam.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Fine Wavy Blonde hair
Review: This product has an amazing fragrance. I bought this to try something new for my fine, wavy, and highlighted hair. I’m working on my routine of the curly girl method. So far this product has been great for my 2A/2B low porosity hair. I use a moisturizing mask made by them as well. I didn’t want to spend a bunch of money trying new things and this has a great price point.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: No more fog on my hair!
Review: I have used a lot of different types of shampoos. I have silver colored hair and all the shampoos I’ve tried have all left my hair a dirty yellow cast. My granddaughter ask me to try her shampoo (this brand) and I loved the way it made my hair feel and look. I had a hard time finding it in the stores and was delighted when I found I could order it on line. I love it!!! No more foggy film!  Everyone that I see in the stores or in public tell me they love my hair. Thanks to the wonderful people that listen.... we don’t like a fog on our hair...we want our hair color to shine!!!!!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Holy curls..
Review: I have tried SO many products, and brands and nothing has done my curls quite as good as Maui Moisture. My hair is soft, shiny, bouncy, defined. So happy with the results. And at the price point?? It doesn’t get any better. Used with the matching conditioner, coconut curl cream, and the new mousse. *MUAH* CHEFS KISS

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Love the shampoo but the packaging is terrible the shampoo leaked everywhere.
Review: Here's the deal LOVE this shampoo but I don't love the fact that when I recieved the shampoo in the package, it had leaked everywhere and I lost a good amount of it. Not sure if I'd want to buy from here again.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Not as expected
Review: Didnt feel like it cleaned my hair at all. Hair still felt greasy and had to use a diff shampoo after.. Not very strong smelling, so I was disappointed.

Title: Maui Moisture Lightweight

Title: wonderful
Review: This product is perfect for my medium thick wavy/curly hair. I am Hispanic with an oily scalp and dry ends. This product does my hair wonders. The smell is so lovely.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Strong cleanser for sulfate-free shampoo
Review: This is a strong cleanser for a sulfate-free shampoo. Usually shampoo every other day, but have to do twice a week with this. Not very moisturizing, but hey, it's a shampoo after all. Good scent, good quality for price.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Smells great, but caused hair loss
Review: I purchased this shampoo & the conditioner as well, because my hairstylist said it doesn't contain waxes & other things that aren't great for your hair. I tried it & love the smell, but within a day or two of using it, I started to notice my hair was falling out! I kept using the products because I wasn't sure exactly what caused the hair loss, but by the time I got halfway through the small bottle (maybe 3 weeks use), I had a noticeable bald spot right above my temple! I stopped using these products & switched to a different brand and within a few days noticed that the hair loss has greatly diminished. I'm not sure if this was an anomaly with my skin/hair, but buyer beware!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: TOP 10 REVIEWER
Review: Reading reviews for personal care products can be a challenge as far as figuring out if the product will help you or not. Like food, comes down to personal preference, and no one will have exact same experience or impression because we all have different hair types and needs. Here are my thoughts on this product, and I will start with what my hair is like to begin with.My hair: DRY, prone to frizz, waist length, healthy, mix of waves and curls (lots of waves because of hair length). Not dyed/colored has some silver at temples. Mid 40s.Lifestyle: I rely on dry shampoo and detangler. My hair is always a tangled mess, and always made worse since I dont comb it daily, nor wash it daily. I'm not too picky about shampoo or conditioner, so long as it doesnt weigh it down nor leave it feeling like straw.THIS particular shampoo and conditioner set is formulated for "all hair types". That made me assume that it will likely clean my hair but do minimal job on hydrating it. I find my assumption accurate. HOWEVER, it had a few positive aspects, one in particular (read way below), that really impressed me. I will explain:-- great aroma. Just a pleasant spring/summer scent.--attractive bottles, but takes a little extra oomph to get the shampoo out because it is a gel--large enough lettering for me to see! My eyes have gotten bad in terms of small lettering. Once I realized that I cant read a shampoo bottle like I used to, it became a point that I would bring up in my reviews (solidarity for my far sighted friends)--cleans the hair well.--->> I start by thoroughly wetting my hair. Then I add a little shampoo. As with most sulfate free shampoo there wont be much lather to start. I dont use a lot to start because I know that the initial application is really just to help break down the grime of the day. So feel free to use a little, let it sit for like 30 seconds or so, then rinse or just add a little more water, then add more shampoo. Feel the lather explode! This will now finish off the cleansing. Very nice.--->> After I rinse, and wring out excess water, I add a generous amount of conditioner. Let sit 3-5 minutes. I think I went no more than 3 minutes. Then rinsed. I could tell that my hair felt kinda slick and smooth as I rinsed. I half wondered if this would weigh down my hair.--->> Afterward, and this is the point that totally WOWED me.. let me back up.. I had used a ton of dry shampoo (couple days worth), plus a hair texturizer (to further give limp dirty hair a boost), and hadn't combed it in a couple of days. SO MY HAIR WAS A RATS NEST. Normally I would detangle it before getting in shower, but this time I did not. I figured.. well, lets see what this shampoo & conditioner can do.So after towel drying. I grabbed my wide tooth comb and detangler spray I expected a chore ahead of me.. to spend the next 10 minutes or so working through all the snarls and knots. Before I sprayed, I took my comb to my hair just to see what nightmare was ahead of me. MY COMB SLID THROUGH MY HAIR. You have no idea how tangled my hair had been. I was so not looking forward to detangling it. YET I didnt have to after using this shampoo and conditioner. WHAT IS THIS SORCERY??Now because of that, I really expected my hair to dry limp. I just assumed it was over conditioned. BUT, my hair dried looking clean and full of body. Curiously, it is still on the dry and slightly frizzy side. Not weighed down at all.So I would say this is more for normal hair, maybe more for hair that leans oily. I think way too light for dry course hair, especially wavy/curly types. It does an absolutely phenomenal job on detangling it (for reals will use this forever more if this is something I can count on). I may consider one of their shampoo and conditioner that is geared for more dry hair.Aroma: 5 starsCleaning: 4-5 starsConditioning: 3 starsGoing with 4 stars as it really isnt for "all hair types", my dry hair is still leaning dry, yet at least looks and feels clean. The unexpected benefit of being a supreme detangler really got me wanting to try something else withing this brand, which I think is worth mentioning.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Way better than the Coconut Quench
Review: My wife wrote this review:This isn't my first time trying their shampoo and conditioner. My first try was with their Coconut Quench. I struggled to get anything out of the bottle, particularly the conditioner. It made my hair too weighed down and I didn't like that my hair seemed to feel more dry and brittle.This Hibiscus Water pair is much better. While it still doesn't come out of the bottles as easy as brands that use different packaging, this was much easier to get out than the Coconut. I wish they would use a pump if they're set on the shape of the bottles or change the bottle so it's easier for the consumer to use.The scent is incredible! Very fruity and reminds me of summertime.Their products, being sulfate-free, have trouble lathering unless you wash twice. Use a small amount first, and rub between palms to work up a lather, then work through hair, rinse, and repeat. The second wash will create a lot of lather!My hair felt clean and wasn't weighed down with this. I let my hair air-dry and my curls didn't have much frizz, bitt it certainly didn't remove it all, and it doesn't claim to tackle frizz, I don't think.My hair did seem more hydrated because my curls were more defined than when I use some other brands. I am chalking that up to the aloe vera being the first ingredient in this.I am removing 1.5 stars due to the bottles. So a 3.5. I won't be buying this in the future because of that. While this is easier to get out than their other one, I wonder if maybe I just got lucky this time or maybe after I use product it will become more difficult to dispense and I cannot stand fighting with product to get out. So I've star for bottles and two stars for price BECAUSE of the bottle and difficulty getting product out. They're cute, but it's a pain. (Please, include a pump)!If they were to do something about the bottles (shape or add a pump to this) then I can see myself purchasing this in the future.I love that it's made in the USA ( with US and imported ingredients), and that it's cruelty-free.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I enjoy hair care products and have long and thick hair that goes to the middle of my back.  I am able to wear it naturally wavy/curly or straight depending on how it dries.  It is healthy and I look for shampoo and conditioner products that help with malleability, strength, shine, and that replenish my hair.  I enjoy scented shampoo and conditioners but notice that there is an extreme amount of floral perfume/fragrance in both.  Artificial perfumes and fragrances can be skin irritants and can also be drying.  This is especially true with sensitive skin.  My hair was difficult to work with after my first use.  I have continued to use it and my hair has become harder to tame.  It knots easier and I feel that it coats my hair causing it to become oilier faster.  There is a fair amount of fragrance left in my hair on my scalp which I am not sure is replenishing. The heavy fragrance seems to weigh down my hair.Suggestions for improvement-less fragrance-silkening ingredients that prevent tangling

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I don't wash my hair but once or twice a week if that, depending on my level of activity. When I do a hard workout and have super greasy hair, I want to use a shampoo that will help bring my hair back to life. The hibiscus shampoo and conditioner is really great. The smell, the quality, the price. This is everything I would expect for a shampoo and conditioner combo at $16 (at the time of review). The shampoo sudds really well. You can ensure all of your hair is covered and moisturized. I definitely feel well hydrated after using this since my hair has volume and not dry or greasy. The conditioner is just as good too. It doesn't strip your hair either. The bottles aren't huge, but you get a lot for the little shampoo it requires to wash long, thick hair. Plus, the bottles ar actually pretty and not boring. Not that I look at that, but it is nice. The one issue I have is the very first squeeze takes a while for shampoo to come out. After that, it works great.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration shampoo and conditioner were available to me through the Amazon Vine program.  I like them.  They are hydrating, with the first ingredient being aloe (followed by water).  They are vegan and free from silicones, parabens, SLS and sulfated surfactants.  The shampoo smells wonderfully fruity and lathers up nicely.  The conditioner leaves hair feeling soft and manageable and easy to comb through.  (Note that it is recommended to keep on 3-5 minutes, which is longer than most other conditioners.)  At the time of this review, this shampoo and conditioner set is about 2.5 times the price of the shampoo alone, which shouldn’t be the case.  This shampoo and conditioner are made in the USA, and Maui is owned by Johnson & Johnson.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I recently got balayage and highlights on the ends of my 3N hair. It was extremely stressed and every shampoo I was using was so drying and I couldn’t get my fingers through the ends while in the shower. Ever since I switched to this I’ve been able to run my fingers through my ends while shampooing. The conditioner adds so much moisture to the strands. My hair is soft and it looks less frizzy without any product in it when I let it dry naturally wavy.I really enjoy the scent because it’s winter and I’m craving spring and summer smells and it’s just got that tropical watermelon fruitiness to it. It’s not like a little kid shampoo though. It’s got a hint of floral to it that makes there scent a bit more complex than a kids shampoo.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: First off, I don't really like the smell of this one. I have used the coconut milk one from this brand and I loved that smell. But this one is a bit bitter and reminds me of when I was young and older ladies perfume. Not my favorite smell.The shampoo has a weird texture, kind of reminds me of egg whites. It was really weird, but when I got it in my hair it did lather well and rinse out well. The conditioner was better, it goes in the hair smoothly. It asks you to leave it in your hair for 3 to 5 minutes which I did. My hair felt smooth and soft at the end. It was easy to brush. And feels soft and lightweight when it is dry. Overall it is okay.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: product review: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Shampoo + Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 Fl OzThis Maui moisture lightweight hydration hibiscus shampoo got nice smell and stays in hair through out the day. The scent is pleasant. The challenge was with the conditioner that is super thick and requires an effort to get it out, currently it is okay with the weight of conditioner I could get it out. I am interested to see how I will get it out when there is not much conditioner in the bottle. As the name suggests, it is lightweight hydration and also sulfate free, so it is not ideal for very oily or greasy hair.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have been a herbal essences / Pantene pro v user forever. I have noticed my hair must of gotten used to those shampoos, so I wanted to change it up.  It's funny, on a trip to Hawaii I ran out of hair care products so purchased these there and loved it.  So I re purchased and now am an avid user. I notice my hair feels cleaner, i don't have to wash it as often to up keep the fresh look and it smells great.  It's got new life and I notice less hair coming out as I wash it. Maybe because I don't wash it as often or because theres less harsh chemicals. I say give it a go and you won't regret it

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: Hair Type 2AWavy Hair Type 1HScalp Type 2SSo as you can see I have fine/medium texture with loose, natural waves across your head. So this lightweight with hydration (without being heavy) is perfect for my hair. I have found that my hair is smooth and shiny after using this and dries without becoming frizzy or looking like I have a ton of or any product on my hair!Smell - Wonderful!Price - FairQuality - Excellent and cleans/smooths my hair while providing essential hydration.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This is a really wonderful shampoo. It has pretty good ingredients and a nice botanical/sweet fragrance that's kind of like the Herbal Essence shampoo line, only not as heavy. For some reason, a lot of shampoos make my hair greasy, but this one did not do that. It has enough of a lather to it that you can make a shampoo mohawk in the shower (what? you don't do that?) but not so much that it clings to your hair or creates a kind of soap scum film. I really like this duo a lot and will be using them regularly.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This shampoo + conditioner duo is quite lovely. Both are lightweight, easy to work into hair, easy to rinse from hair. Shampoo does a great job of gently cleansing. Leaves hair soft and hydrated when used alone. The conditioner hydrates, softens and smooths hair while leaving it soft and shiny. Each has an amazing scent that is not at all overpowering, gagging or terribly 'flowery'. Both can be used on all hair types, including color treated hair.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This brand is amazing. I’ve used a different shampoo from them so when I saw the shampoo + conditioner combo, I knew I had to grab it. I enjoyed the scent and the conditioner had a lot of slip. Made my wash day easy and smooth.However, the conditioner was leaking out of the bottle. Plus, took about a month to get to me in Florida so that was also a downer.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This is a nice shampoo and conditioner set. I honestly couldn't even notice a scent to it, although I had high hopes of tropical paradise. But no such luck.  It cleaned and conditioned my hair, but again, honestly, it didn't seem any better or any worse than any basic shampoo I've used. It's really pretty though and the bottles look great in the shower.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This shampoo and conditioner combo arrived quickly and well packaged. They smell nice, but the texture (of shampoo in particular) is odd: it's more gel-like and "gloopy" - something that I did not expect. It doesn't lather very well. For hair products marketed as "moisturizing", these did not leave my hair feeling hydrated any more than basic shampoos.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This shampoo and conditioner duo has made my hair super soft and easy to take care of. I really like the smell of it as well! The ingredients seem to be really clean and lack the chemicals that are supposedly bad to use. A little bit of conditioner and shampoo goes a long way and I think the bottles will last quite a long time.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: DO NOT USE IT MADE MY HAIR FALL OUT
Review: WHATEVER YOU DO, DO NOT USE THIS SHAMPOO IT MADE MY HAIR FALL OUT FOR WEEKS. This the worst shampoo I have ever used. Every time I would take a shower a huge amount of hair would fall out and I thought it was stress but then I stopped using just the shampoo to see if it was the problem. Once I stopped using it, my hair stopped coming out and got much healthier. AVOID AT ALL COSTS

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Acne???
Review: So I’ve been using this product for about three weeks now and love everything about it!!! My 2b curls look better than they have since I was a little girl!!! The only thing is ever since I started using this I’ve been having horrible acne on my hairline and forehead. It’s so so so bad and I don’t usually breakout bad like this I just have occasional acne but this is SO BAD and they’re white heads and I can tell by the acne something is irritating and breaking me out and I think it’s this shampoo

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have always wanted to try this shampoo and conditioner set. Glad I did, wonderful product. Great results and wonderfully scented. It isn't too heavy or too light. Just the right amount of lather for shampooing and just the right feel for conditioning. I really enjoyed using this product.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: As soon as I tried to open these bottles, they had leaked everywhere.  Who in todays times would not seal the bottles?  I think they both leaked and the bottles were slimy.  Unfortunately for me this is just a no go, I cannot keep it nor can I donate this product.  Save your money.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: My Hair is Dead
Review: Both the shampoo with the use of the Shea Butter Conditioner dryer my hair to DEATH. Before Maui my hair was soft and had volume (I have 3C hair). It’s only been 1 month of using these products and I can see and feel where my hair has thinned and has a gel like feel. My hair has started to loose it’s curly pattern and is crunchy. I only use the shampoo, conditioner, and leave-in. I’m only 18 and I’m blessed my hair grows quickly. However, the middle of my hair and down is dead and stringy. I never had a dry scalp before, but now it is severely dry and itchy.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Best lightweight sulfate free shampoo
Review: This shampoo is awesome at moisturizing with aloe as its first ingredient. It could feel like a weird texture, but that’s because of the aloe. I have oily scalp and dry ends and this works perfectly for me with a deep conditioner. Most ppl don’t need to wash the ends of their hair every wash unless they sweat a lot.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is the second scent of this brand of shampoo & conditioner that I’ve ordered and I love them. They smell amazing, make my hair feel so soft and healthy and are made from good ingredients.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I really feel like this left my hair noticeably nice and shiny. The scent is not overpowering and I like that. I tend to have dry hair and it didn't weigh down my hair or make it extra frizzy.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Stripped my low porosity hair and dried it out
Review: This stripped my low porosity, 2C hair of moisture.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: DO NOT USE
Review: decided to try this after seeing how it’s “natural” and then i noticed my hair falling like crazy, and in clumps. I have always had thick hair all my life and now it is so thin and i have a bald spot, i thought it was due to stress but i haven’t been too stressed and after doing some research A LOT of users have had the same issue that there is even active lawsuits. please don’t ruin your hair and stay away from this brand !

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Hair Loss
Review: I used the shampoo/conditioner once without incident. The second time I had noticed a slight tingling on my scalp and then clumps of hair fell out. I have never experienced this with any shampoo before. I immediately discontinued using it. A few Google searches and I found out this has happened to many people. User beware!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: It's shinny and hair
Review: Love it

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Favorite shampoo!!!! Smells great, natural, and VALUE $$$
Review: This is one of my favorite shampoo products! Incredible price for ACTUALLY cleaning my hair , love that it’s got such natural ingredients AND smells great and works !!!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Don’t buy this it causes hair loss and cancer
Review: I bought Maui and literally my hair started to fall out so don’t buy this

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: No regrets. Best shampoo ever.
Review: This is the best shampoo that I’ve ever had. My personal hair isn’t oily or dry. The smell is AWESOME. It’s very easy to smooth your hair out with it. I had no problem with the packaging at all. I would definitely recommend getting this.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Don't buy this
Review: I have two words: NEVER AGAIN. This stuf left my scalp dry and I have lots of dandruff

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Made my hair fall out!
Review: Made my hair fall out! I read the reviews on Ulta’s website saying the same thing but didn’t want to believe it. I should have listened. This made my hair fall out within 3 washes and that’s the only thing I changed. Don’t buy! It’s too much of a hassle to return so I’m just using it as hand soap.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Poor packaging
Review: Smells great but it spilled in the package and I lost about 30% of the shampoo.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: smells great
Review: love this shampoo.. i can tell it gets my hair cleaner and it leaves it so soft.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Amazingggg
Review: This was amazing. I always look at reviews before buying things, and the reviews we pretty good. It smells so good, and they packaged it amazing so there was no spillsssss. Definitely getting more!!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Made my hair soft
Review: Smalls good. Made hair soft and manao

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Love.
Review: Was boxed you nicely. Smells soo good.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Good
Review: Conditioners really hard to get out of the bottle

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I really like this shampoo and conditioner and I love this brand. I had used the blue bottles from this brand and loved it so I wanted to try these out too, I figured they would be just as good or better then the other set and I was right. This shampoo is infused with hibiscus water, passion fruit and watermelon, it made my hair feel so soft and clean. After using this set my hair seem to have alot more bounce to it then usual, which I loved. It didn’t weigh my hair down like alot of others do. It was so soft and easy to manage without any frizz, my hair is usually frizzy after I blow dry it but after using these it was so much easier to straighten and fix. It really made a difference in my hair. I also love how great it smells and that I can smell it in my hair all day. This is a really great set and really helps to condition your hair and leaves it soft and clean. My hair has never felt so clean!! Would definitely recommend!!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Kind of expensive in my opinion but I love the fragrance
Review: I first bought Maui at a discount store the sea minerals. And I've bought several others but this is one of my favorites . My hair is so dry not much works to moisturize it I just love the scent.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Honest Review
Review: Love the scent and how my hair feels after.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Great smell, maybe not for me though.
Review: 𝗦𝗖𝗘𝗡𝗧: I'm all for fruit/floral scented shampoos, but I've got to say this for my lads, this is exceptionally fruity and floral. It's a very pleasant smell though. If those scent profiles are your preference, this will be for you.𝗦𝗖𝗔𝗟𝗣: I'd say I'm more on the oily side, and the day after using this (and maybe even almost immediately out of the shower), my scalp was feeling a little irritated. I'm not sure if it dried me out per se but come the following day, my scalp was itchy and oily feeling.I'd say this is for people with non-sensitive scalps and (this is a blanket statement but) people who like more feminine scents. Not bad, just not for me!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I’ve always wanted to try Maui moisture hair products so I was so excited to wash my hair with this shampoo and conditioner combo. I love the bright pink bottle! The smell of these soaps are amazing and leave my hair smelling fresh for a while. I was pleasantly surprised to feel how soft and hydrated my hair was after using these products for the first time. I like that there’s no sulfates either! I’m excited to try other variations of this product and would recommend it for the price.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: So much wax!
Review: It leaves hair very, very waxy! Smells great tho! I thought my daughter just wasn’t fully rinsing but the shampoo just leaves a waxy film on her hair. I tried it on my hair too and it did the same. So we gave it to a friend because they loved the smell and the same happened to them. Sad because it’s so heavenly smelling

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: very awsome
Review: I think that it was a very good deal because it does not ruin mz daughters hair it just keeps it all natural.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Open bottle
Review: This bottle of shampoo was delivered open and missing 1/4 of the bottle. It also got all over the other items in the box

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: These products leave my hair clean, nicely scented but not overly scented, and soft feeling. Those are the basic things I expect from shampoo and conditioner and this set delivers those things. I have zero issues with these products. My hair is not dry so in terms of hydration, I really can't say that I think my hair is more moisturized because it wasn't in bad condition to start. I like these products and will buy them again in the future.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Great
Review: For its price and performance, it's a steal. Low price, does great with my half thin half thick wavy/curly hair.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Perfect for low porosity hair!
Review: I was hesitant to buy this conditioner since Aloe was an ingredient. I have extremely protein sensitive hair and aloe typically doesn't react well with my low porosity strands.  I didn't notice how well it worked until after observing how moisturized my curls felt over the course of three days! I used it again before straightening my hair and my hair felt incredible! In my opinion, this conditioner is better than the Shea Moisture's Low Porosity line that was discontinued. I haven't tried Maui's shampoo from this line yet but I hope it works great also.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Changed My Life!
Review: I have both the shampoo and conditioner. This line is literally the only thing I have ever tried that can actually make my hair go from limp waves to healthy looking curls! I love how light it is, perfect for my thin, low porosity hair. It smells really nice too!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Perfect for Curls
Review: This conditioner has great slip for detangling hair in the shower. Perfect for curly girls since it is silicone free!! Smells nice and works well with aloe as the first ingredient

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: I currently don’t use this brand’s products anymore.
Review: I used to love this brand until I found out that there was DMDM hydantoin in some (if not all) of their products. the chemical DMDM hydantoin is a formaldehyde donor / released preservative, an allergen/irritant, (and possibly carcinogenic — as formaldehyde is potentially carcinogenic and also an irritant), which can cause hair damage/loss and/or scalp/skin problems, etc. I currently don’t use this brand’s products anymore as I avoid using products with the chemical DMDM hydantoin. — Amy Rose, Main Character (@VeganAmyRose).

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Awesome product!
Review: Very awesome product ! I absolutely love these products from this company and the packaging is everything ! Must buy!💞

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Give it a try
Review: Smell is really beautiful but I'd not say the same for detangling and smoothness performance. I definitely have used better ones for cheaper. Wouldn't buy again, but still five stars for the smell..

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: BLESS THIS MAGIC
Review: There was a little product seeping out from under the lid, but not discernable cracks or damage to the bottle.This stuff smells LOVELY and GORGEOUS and it was worth waiting by the mailbox for. My hair was so limp and clogged from the wrong hair products (I have low porosity wavy and was using heavy products),  but I used this in the shower with a gentle clearing Aveeno shampoo, plopped it, then put it in a silk beanie when I went to bed,  and I woke up a GODDESS again. My hair was soft, bouncy, curly/wavy, detangled goodness. My husband was all about it. I also didn't have to use gallons on my hair, so this product should last me a minute. It's now day 3 hair and there is still curl clumping 👏 and minimal frizz 👏 and it still smells good. Can't imagine what this is like paired with the shampoo.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Smells great but that’s it
Review: ***UPDATE***I’ve been using this for a while now trying to give it some time, being I’ve heard such good things about this shampoo and conditioner....but this has done nothing except made my dry scalp worse.I have dry spots all over my scalp, it’s horrible. And it makes my scalp SO ITCHY. The only good thing about this is the scent. I do not recommend for sensitive scalps :(:(I bought the shampoo and conditioner in hopes of replacing my head and shoulders with something a little better ingredients wise. My hair and scalp gets so dry especially in the wintertime. It smells great but I have a few complaints. First, the conditioner is incredibly hard to get out of the bottle, I don’t know if it’s the bottle or the thickness but it’s pretty annoying. Secondly, my scalp gets pretty itchy still and I still have a few dry spots. I will continue to use for a few weeks and update if it gets better. I only just started using it so I will give it time.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Great product, just not from Amazon I guess 🤷🏻‍♀️
Review: Okay so, I'm not usually a harsh rater when it comes to this kind of thing.Let me start off by saying, its definitely not like what you would get at the store. Its a completely different texture. Secondly, I had the shampoo and conditioner for a little over a month before tossing it out because the smell in the bottle COMPLETELY  disepated and it just smells like gross chemicals.I love this line, just not from Amazon.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Low porosity hair
Review: This has been the best for my head full of curvy, fine, low porosity hair. I tend to have very oily scalp/roots & dry ends, but this has made my hair more balanced, root to tip. Very lightweight & makes my curls & waves less frizzy & so soft. The scent is light, which I prefer. It is difficult to get through my hair though. Not much slip, but I don't know if that would change its effectiveness for low porosity. I will continue to buy & recommend for anyone with similar hair.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: If you like baby powder you will like this..
Review: I’m a very scent oriented person..I feel like the smell of the soap, shampoo and conditioner are the best part of the shower experience. And this conditioner is sadly a big letdown. It smells like slightly sweet baby powder. I don’t like baby powder, so this is really gross to me. It takes my shower time from “ooh ahh” to “ew ugh”. Thankfully the scent rinses out and doesn’t linger in my hair.Also the packaging needs a rethink, I find it very difficult to squeeze out the product.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Don't torture your locks!
Review: This stuff immediately made my hair feel like straw & tangled the second I applied it! Stripped all the natural oils out & I had to clean my drain of the copious amount of hair that fell out. I don't color or heat style my hair, so that wasn't the issue. This shampoo was super thick & sticky with ZERO scent.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: She be doing her job 💅🏼
Review: Im here from the other Maui bamboo shampoo so lemme restate everything. I’m 16 and I was looking a lot of hair (not from stress babe) and I was looking for new products that would be better for my hair. I have type 2a hair and I have greasy hair. I do 2 washes with this shampoo and my hair felt so clean. I used the Hibiscus Water conditioner instead of the same  collection because I heard it was a little drying. This combination works so well. The smell is also very fresh. The Hibiscus waters scent smells sweet like a watermelon. Ik i saw some tik toks that said it might have a ingredient that’s bad for you which is the Diazolidinyl Urea but I was willing to try this. The pink Hibiscus Waters conditioner does not have this!  It’s awesome and I also use a Wet hair brush from the company Wet. They cause less breakage since the bristles are more flexible. For a leave in conditioner I use the Keratin Hask Spray and I do not spray my scalp with this because it’s not supposed to be used like that. This has been helping my hair (as it should purrr) and I hope it helps y’all too.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Didn't Do Anything For Me
Review: I have fine hair that has plenty of moisture but tangles easily. So, I got this for after shampooing...and even though it's somewhat lightweight, it doesn't really help with detangling at all for me. I don't know how to explain it, but it almost feels kind of acidic on my hair. Like, it just grabs my hair and makes it sticky but doesn't sink in. I don't know, I've just never used a conditioner that feels like this. And I've tried a TON of conditioners. I guess it just feels odd and doesn't really do much, even with it being lightweight. I have had other lightweight conditioners in the past that at the very least detangle my hair. But hair products are so specific to every individual, so I can't definitively say it sucks for everyone. I bought, so I'll use it up, but I personally won't buy it again.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: So nice!
Review: I have thin, damaged hair that is bleached and long in length. This shampoo and conditioner makes my hair feel, look, and smell so nice! The shampoo cleanses well but doesn’t feel stripping since it doesn’t have sulfates in it, and the conditioner is moisturizing yet lightweight on my thin hair! It smells light and fresh all day long. I’d definitely recommend these!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Love it
Review: After taking way too long to do a porosity test I found out I was low porosity and bought this conditioner immediately after. I use a lot of conditioner but this bottle holds a surprising amount and the consistency is not too thin or too thick. After a few uses my hair no longer immediately pours out water, it’s incredibly soft, and my curls look great for more than one day. Highly recommend if you’re a struggling with low porosity

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Leaves a pleasant scent and feel to your hair.
Review: Probably one of the best fragrances they offer. I work hard and my hair takes a beating from the sun and constant interactions w my environment of jet fumes and debris. I enjoy the shampoo and conditioner and feeling clean after use. Ya, it's a little on the feminine side but I honestly don't mind w this. It smells and feels pretty damn good...

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Great lightweight but nourishing
Review: Second time I’ve bought this conditioner. Great because there’s no coconut oil to weigh my hair down. Love the smell. Hate the packaging though. Square bottle makes it hard to get out.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Isopropyl Alcohol?
Review: When I first used it, the first thing I noticed was the smell. It smells like straight up rubbing alcohol. I looked at the ingredients and Isopropyl Alcohol was one of them. The texture is weird, it’s thin and almost gritty? It didn’t feel too moisturizing in the shower, HOWEVER.. I was able to brush my hair wet much more easily than other conditioners I’ve used. I don’t know if I got a bad batch but seeing Isopropyl Alcohol as an ingredient definitely caught me off guard.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: To drying for my fine hair
Review: Love this whole brand but this one with the least hydration was too drying for my fine thin hair

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Hair Fell Out
Review: My hair was coming out in bunches after using this! I stopped using it right away. I've never had that issue with Shampoo or Conditioner before. It seemed to be both the Shampoo and the Conditioner. Maybe it's just my hair...

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Sickly, overly-sweet smell.
Review: I can’t give an accurate review because I couldn’t get past the scent which was overwhelming. I donated both the shampoo and conditioner.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: you’ll smell amazing
Review: my favorite shampoo and conditioner by far. they make your hair smell so amazing. i always get compliments about smelling good. definitely try this shampoo or one of the other maui moisture scents. they’re all amazing (this one’s my favorite though).

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Please redesign the bottles!
Review: Firstly I like the smell. It’s light and pretty. I was drawn to the pink bottle and I’m always looking for sulfate and paraben free shampoo/conditioner. What I disliked was that it was so difficult to squeeze out of the bottle. The shampoo was fine, but the conditioner has the viscosity of rubber cement so you put that in a hard square bottle and even when it’s full I had to bang on it upside down to get out. It’s a petty problem but irritating enough that I would not buy it again.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Freakin fabulous conditioner.
Review: This is great stuff. A bit pricey but it’s so nice. Smells great, really thick and moisturizing. If Bath and Body Works made a conditioner, this would be it.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: It might be good but it won't come out of the bottle.
Review: I like all the Maui products I've tried and feel sure I would like this one too, but it's so thick I literally cannot get it out of the bottle. . I tapped on the bottom, I hit it against the shower wall, but nothing came out. I want a shower not a workout. Finally pitched it in the trash.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Just looks pretty
Review: Nothing really special about this... it’s one of those hyped up products for no reason. Doesn’t make my hair any less oily, gets oily a day later like usual. Makes my hair a bit frizzy too. Going back to my free & clear... more costly but way better.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Buildup on scalp
Review: The shampoo and conditioner gave me build up and an itchy scalp. My curls kind of fell flat which was odd since I have naturally curly hair.The smell is nice but it was not worth it.The parent company tests on animals, that's a hard pass...goodbye!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Not for Oily Hair Types
Review: Unfortunately this product made my hair greasier. It made me look like I hadn’t showered. It’s advertised as for all hair types but this did not work for me. I would recommend to those with dry hair. My hair leans towards being oily. I liked the smell, and this seems like a nice cruelty free company. I’m sad this didn’t work for me.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Hydrating and amazing!!
Review: Makes my hair feel silky smooth and light enough to move just right. Smells great, feels great.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Daughter Loves it for her curly hair
Review: My daughter has naturally curly hair and she's made her way through professional and store bought products over the years. She's been really happy with this and so far no major residue build up.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Awesome shampoo!
Review: I’ve been using this product for several months. I just started getting it in subscribe and save which saved me quite a bit of money! I love this shampoo and how it makes my hair and scalp feel. Plus the smell is amazing! I definitely recommend!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Best For Oily Hair
Review: This shampoo is actually best for oily hair. It doesn't weigh down your hair and has the most incredible smell. Highly recommended!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Good stuff
Review: Great in between version of Maui when you don't need quite as much moisturizer

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Curly Girl
Review: The product smells like summertime fun and the consistency is good for a product used on natural hair

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Good product
Review: Product is great, sometime between shipping and delivery it opened and some of the product was out and covering the bottle.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: The Smell- Amazing
Review: This didn't do great for my hair but the smell was worth it.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: It’s an okay product
Review: It smells really good. I just don’t feel it conditioned my dry hair as well as I need. It feels moisturizing but only during shower.. I don’t feel it helps set angle after the fact. I think it was worth the 6-7$ to try out

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration
Review: I disliked the product, Not for my hair.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: smell's great
Review: Hair is shiny and soft . Will buy again

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Too lightweight for my hair type
Review: Great product it just created a lot of flyaway electricity in my hair

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Smell good
Review: Look how it makes hair feel

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Showed up broken and not sealed.
Review: Bottle came not sealed the cap was broken and conditioner was all over the top, seemed sketchy..will not be using.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: It smells SO good!
Review: I’m obsessed with the smell of this conditioner. It reminds me of a Bottled Emotion perfume from the 90’s. My hair is super short right now so I don’t know what it’s doing for my curl, but I currently have no complaints!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Ehh
Review: Not really a good conditioner. If you have dry hair don’t buy this one, buy the one that’s actually for dry hair

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: This product is amazing
Review: This product is amazing I use it for my daughters hair she is biracial and it has been the best product for her hair so far I love how it adds moisture to her hair

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Quality, Budget-Friendly, Smells Great.
Review: Very nice product.  A+  Except, thought I was purchasing "Leave In" but it's not.  My hair absolutely adores leave in Conditioners.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Lovely
Review: For thinner hair this may be a heavy container. I have med thick, long hair and love it.The smell is not overwhelming, light and tropical, doesn't give me a headache.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Hugh quality great price
Review: Feels great smells greatDefinitely a higher end quality

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Buen producto
Review: Mi esposa lo compra siempre

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Amazing
Review: My fav conditioning product, help my natural 4C hair detangle right away, leaves hair soft and curly

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Awesome product
Review: Shipped very quickly and is the best conditioner for your hair

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Made our hair fall out. No, seriously.
Review: We have been using Maui Moisture (various formulas) for a couple years now, and at first we loved it. I started noticing my hair falling out by the handfuls every time I washed it, and didn't connect it to these products until my husband also started looking like an 80 year old man with thinning hair. He thought he was losing his hair early, I thought I was stressed. We both lost about 3/4 of our original thickness, so recently switched to another brand (Raw Sugar). Immediately the hair loss stopped and our hair feels much better now, although very damaged from years of Maui Moisture. Hair loss, dryness, split ends, dull color, no body, and hair weighed down and coated in disgusting propylene glycol. DO NOT PURCHASE THESE PRODUCTS.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Do not use on curly hair..ever!
Review: I purchased this product along with the shampoo, and my hair is now fried. I have naturally curly hair, so my shower is filled with different products to try and get some moisture in my dry curly hair. This is the opposite of moisture..it’s like if I lived in the driest climate imaginable and then poured chemicals on my hair to make sure it fried it. I’m sure it’s great for those who have oily hair and scalp, but for those with dry hair, this will kill it, period. Buyer beware. Pretty bottles, terrible product for normal to dry hair.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: SOFT AND SHINY HAIR!
Review: I love Love “LOVE” this shampoo and conditioner. I have been trying all types of pharmacy products. Until one day I came across this name brand. I found the packing attractive and the scent pleasing. So I said what the heck! I Was pleasantly surprised with the results. It left my hair soft, less frizz, and brought out my natural shine! I strongly recommend this product!

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Lightweight but moisturizing, clarifying, perfect for 2C/3A low porosity hair!!!
Review: I have low porosity 2C/3A hair. When Shea Moisture’s Low Porosity shampoo was discontinued, I was DEVASTATED.Everywhere I searched for a similar product would recommend this shampoo. Being that it was an unfamiliar brand (and very affordable), I was hesitant to try it.I ordered it with the best hopes and no matter how many times a week I wash, my hair is perfectly moisturizer and lightweight!! I’m so excited and happy about this product. It’s been over a month now and it hasn’t lost its charm.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: My 3b/3c hair was shedding because of this product.
Review: Dont use. I have curly 3b/3c hair and I've been using this product for a while. I always notice that I get alot of shedding and I thought that it was because of stress because I study and work. But as soon as I decided to swap both of my maui moisture shampoo and conditioner for shea moisture jamaican black castor oil brand, there was no more shedding. Before my hair was accumulating by a handful per wash, and idk why it took me so long to find out that it was these products but I'm glad I did. My hair is very thin and I am contemplating getting a hair cut but I will try to revive and regrow it first before big chopping. Please learn from my experience

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Super lightweight and moisturizing for hair that gets easy buildup
Review: I switched to the Maui Moisture hibiscus water line from co-washing because I was experiencing scalp problems, frizz, and terrible buildup. This stuff is great! The shampoo cleans well without drying and is moisturizing, and the conditioner moisturized without weighing down. It is perfect for fine, low porosity hair. My buildup issues are gone and my frizz is SO much better.

Product: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 fl oz
Title: Repaired Hair
Review: My hair improved a lot if went from thin to dry hair to shiny hair volume hair within a few weeks of. Mixed it between using the shampoo and conditioner from Maui Moisture. No Sulfates a plus! Love the pink bottle packing. Some improvements wish the smell lasted a bit longer/the bottle is kind of hard to use-squeeze. Came unprotected so some of the conditioner spilled. I used it in combo with a shampoo brush; give it try! Little goes a long way.

Product: Maui Moisture Heal & Hydrate + Shea Butter Shampoo to Repair & Deeply Moisturize Tight Curly Hair with Coconut & Macademia Oils, Vegan, Silicone, Paraben & Sulfate-Free, 13 fl oz
Title: Burned my skin!
Review: I purchased the shampoo, conditioner and hair mask in the heal and hydrate line. I can’t believe these products actually burned my skin! I recommend getting the Think Dirty app because this product has lots of chemicals that are harmful to your skin and body... I don’t normally have sensitive skin either... I wish I could give this zero stars... conditioner and mask are very thin consistency which is not what I was looking for either....

Product: Maui Moisture Heal & Hydrate + Shea Butter Shampoo to Repair & Deeply Moisturize Tight Curly Hair with Coconut & Macademia Oils, Vegan, Silicone, Paraben & Sulfate-Free, 13 fl oz
Title: Drastically improved my hair loss.
Review: This is a little contrary to another review but I used to shed like my cats. If I walked around with my hair down there would be a trail of hair left behind. I would lose so much hair in the shower like I had to move the hair away from the drain (I know, EW!) I don’t even know how I still have enough hair left to cover my head with all the shedding!! BUT THIS SHAMPOO. It is more expensive than the sulfate free ogx one I’ve been using, but idk if it’s the aloe vera in this or what but I lose so little hair now. Like five strands fall out in the shower. It’s so crazy!! Thank you Maui!

Product: Maui Moisture Heal & Hydrate + Shea Butter Shampoo to Repair & Deeply Moisturize Tight Curly Hair with Coconut & Macademia Oils, Vegan, Silicone, Paraben & Sulfate-Free, 13 fl oz
Title: Tangled my straight asian hair like nothing else has before :(
Review: I was so excited to try this shampoo and conditioner pair  based on the reviews. I have typical, straight, thick Asian hair, but recently my hair has gotten a little wavy and rough, dry, and tangles easily, which I've never had a problem with before. I've tried a couple of shampoo/conditioner pairs since and this brand is by far the worst of all.I used it for a few consecutive washes just to make sure (I wash every other day), and this shampoo and conditioner somehow both weighed my hair down (it felt heavy?) but also dried out and tangled my hair worse than any other product in my life. My hair felt SO rough to the touch and I actually had a giant tangle the size of a ping pong ball that HURT to try to untangle, which has never happened before. I basically basted my hair in a different conditioner that was okay but I didn't love to gently untangle the mess this brand made. I'm fairly certain this brand made my back and skin break out as well. Very disappointed, maybe my hair is  not a good match for it? :(

Product: Maui Moisture Heal & Hydrate + Shea Butter Shampoo to Repair & Deeply Moisturize Tight Curly Hair with Coconut & Macademia Oils, Vegan, Silicone, Paraben & Sulfate-Free, 13 fl oz
Title: Awful product…. Don’t buy :(
Review: This product gave me a really extra clean look so clean as if it were bleached that gave me lots of frizz as you can see in my picture. Not to mention the fall out of my hair….. I was loosing chunks and lumps of hair at each wash. I don’t recommend this at all :(

Product: Maui Moisture Heal & Hydrate + Shea Butter Shampoo to Repair & Deeply Moisturize Tight Curly Hair with Coconut & Macademia Oils, Vegan, Silicone, Paraben & Sulfate-Free, 13 fl oz
Title: Good moisturizing
Review: My hair has been dry dry dry.  We have well water and a water softener.  I have very thick hair.  The length is about 6 inches past my shoulders. I was having problems with such horrible knots,  I was ready to get it all cut off.  I read this shampoo and conditioner would help moisturize.  I really like it.  It has helped.  At first I was using the shampoo and conditioner and then adding an additional name-brand leave in conditioner.  But now. I'm able to use this shampoo and conditioner only without an additional leave in conditioner. It is a great value for the price and or smells nice too!!

Product: Maui Moisture Heal & Hydrate + Shea Butter Shampoo to Repair & Deeply Moisturize Tight Curly Hair with Coconut & Macademia Oils, Vegan, Silicone, Paraben & Sulfate-Free, 13 fl oz
Title: Do Not Use on Thick Oily Hair
Review: I have oily roots but the rest of my hair is dry. I've used "hydrating" and "moisturizing" shampoos before but wanted to try something new. I gave the moisturizing quality 5 stars because I couldn't go more than a day without washing it, so it definitely moisturizes if that's what your looking for - but not for me. Normally I can go about 3 days with the help with baby powder and dry shampoo but not with this. It made my hair feel very heavy and as my sister described it, "it feels like someone put lotion in your hair." Maybe it's better for people with thin and very dry hair. I used it about 6 times and had to give it away.

Product: Maui Moisture Heal & Hydrate + Shea Butter Shampoo to Repair & Deeply Moisturize Tight Curly Hair with Coconut & Macademia Oils, Vegan, Silicone, Paraben & Sulfate-Free, 13 fl oz
Title: Great buy
Review: I have been using this product in my partner hair and it has been doing a great job. It moisturizing the hair while cleaning it. The scent is lovely. For the price it is worth buying. You dont have to use a huge amount and it going through the hair easily. The shampoo and conditioner washes out without leaving any residue just enough moisture for the hair and does the cleaning job perfect. The hair mask i have been using for my 4c hair before braiding and it gives my hair a different texture, more manageable as my partner hair is more of a curly texture. So though our hair texture is different it treats them both the same. Compliments them, moisturize them and keep them hydrated

Title: Smells good//Wasted Product :(
Review: The smell is amazing and I cannot wait to try. The second I opened the box I was hit with such a very strong beautiful aroma. My only issue is that my shampoo must have opened during delivery because the bottle has no damage, but the lid was closed when I opened the box so it might have just leaked out of the bottle? I was super excited to try Maui products but opening my package to find a good bit of product had gone to waste was extremely underwhelming. I’m also confused on why only one bottle was wrapped, the bottle that was wrapped didn’t leak at all. I had seen a few other reviews saying the same thing about wasted product or even about damaged bottles so little helpful advice for future orders to save your customers and your company from wasting any more time and money, maybe you guys should wrap every product so that product doesn’t spill out or so the bottles don’t get damaged (:

Also doesn’t have a great smell - it’s not bad, just not great, either. After using with the conditioner my hair feels good and I know I’m not damaging my hair, which is really all that matters. Right?

Product: Maui Moisture Heal & Hydrate + Shea Butter Shampoo to Repair & Deeply Moisturize Tight Curly Hair with Coconut & Macademia Oils, Vegan, Silicone, Paraben & Sulfate-Free, 13 fl oz
Title: The smell is amazing
Review: This shampoo is very moisture rich.  For me, this isn’t the best for a shampoo because it makes my scalp oily pretty quickly.  I will still use it because it smells so good!  I like the conditioner better because it has the same smell.  The conditioner is thick and it feels like it penetrates the hair better than lighter conditioners.  I prefer the conditioner over the shampoo and I think the price is good for the quality of then product.  I prefer this scent and product the most from this brand.  However, I really do not like the deep conditioning masque in this same scent.  It is terrible and makes my hair feel like I put something extremely cheap on my hair.

Product: Maui Moisture Heal & Hydrate + Shea Butter Shampoo to Repair & Deeply Moisturize Tight Curly Hair with Coconut & Macademia Oils, Vegan, Silicone, Paraben & Sulfate-Free, 13 fl oz
Title: Great for my aging, fine-but-thick, graying hair
Review: This is my go-to shampoo. I'm a white lady growing my fine hair out long, and I'm 40yo, so there's new gray and a different texture than before. I thought I'd need to really strip my hair to get body and movement, but I actually need more moisturising and repair than I thought. Paired with the conditioner, this is the only stuff that really makes me want to keep growing it out. Highly recommend!!

Product: Maui Moisture Heal & Hydrate + Shea Butter Shampoo to Repair & Deeply Moisturize Tight Curly Hair with Coconut & Macademia Oils, Vegan, Silicone, Paraben & Sulfate-Free, 13 fl oz
Title: I look forward to washing my hair now
Review: I decided I need a moisturizing shampoo to keep my hair healthy as I grow it out, so I gave this one a try. Boy is it nice. I would venture to say it is the best shampoo I’ve ever used. The scent is not flowery, which is important to me because I don’t want to smell  like a flower. It smells really nice and tropical. It’s hard to describe the scent; not really coconut, maybe more like macadamia. But the real beauty is the lather. This just feels so rich and smooth. And it leaves my hair soft and silky. I don’t even use conditioner with it because the shampoo does such a good job.

Again, I think I’d you have hair that needs there moisturizing, this product would be fantastic though and it does smell great.
